products.description: Men’s Rogaine minoxidil for men foam is a clinically proven topical aerosol hair regrowth treatment featuring a 5% minoxidil formula to reactivate hair follicles and help regrow fuller, thicker hair. Designed for the early stages of thinning at the vertex (top of the scalp), this unscented minoxidil for men foam leverages Tricho-Prime Technology—a blend of botanical extracts, nourishing emollients, and alpha hydroxy acid (AHA)—to condition and gently exfoliate the scalp, help keep follicles open, and create an optimal environment for hair growth. Clinical studies show noticeable new hair regrowth in 12 weeks with consistent twice-daily use; individual timelines vary, and you may notice early signs between weeks 8–12 with fuller benefits around week 16. Because response can vary, you may experience initial shedding as weaker hairs make way for new growth; maintain consistent application to see the best results over time. To use, dispense approximately half a capful and apply directly to clean, dry thinning areas on the top of the scalp morning and night, gently massaging the product into the skin; allow it to dry completely before styling. The no-mess, quick-absorbing foam integrates seamlessly into daily routines and fits easily into your regular hair care regimen. Each pack provides a 3-month supply with three 2.11 oz bottles to support uninterrupted treatment and routine adherence. As a trusted hair loss treatment for men, this targeted foam penetrates the scalp to stimulate follicle activity and support hair protein production for visible regrowth with continued use. For best results, commit to consistent twice-daily application for at least 4 months to allow new growth to appear and mature; ongoing use is needed to maintain results. Rogaine is the #1 dermatologist-recommended hair growth product brand. If you’re ready to address hereditary hair loss at the vertex, choose the convenience of minoxidil for men foam and start your hair growth journey today.

Additionally, its low electromagnetic wave technology reduces radiation by 50%, making it a safer choice for pregnant women and children.

products.product_name: Biolage Color Last Shampoo - For Color-Treated Hair, Nourishes, Strengthens, Hydrates and Adds Shine, Soybean Oil & Stearic Acid, Paraben & Mineral Oil-Free, Vegan, 33.8 Fl Oz
products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Hair Care > Shampoo & Conditioner > Shampoos
products.description:
**Biolage Color Last Shampoo: Vibrant Color, Lasting Shine** Experience the brilliance of Biolage Color Last Shampoo, your ultimate solution for color-treated hair. Infused with a powerful blend of soybean oil and stearic acid, this low-pH formula gently cleanses while preserving your hair's vibrant color and radiant shine. Say goodbye to dullness and fading, and embrace locks that stay true to tone, wash after wash. **Key Benefits:** - Preserves color depth and tone - Enhances shine and smoothness - Nourishes and strengthens hair - Prevents color fade for up to 4 weeks* - Delivers 35% more shine after just one use* - Makes hair 13x smoother and 2x stronger* **How It Works:** Our carefully calibrated color care concentrate, featuring antioxidant-rich soybean oil and protective stearic acid, forms a lightweight veil over each strand, shielding it from color-damaging aggressors. This dynamic duo nourishes, conditions, and seals in moisture, leaving your color-treated hair feeling soft, smooth, and irresistibly healthy. **A Sustainable Choice:** At Biolage, we believe in beauty without compromise. Our Color Last Shampoo is proudly vegan, cruelty-free, and formulated without parabens, mineral oil, or colorants. Plus, our bottles and caps are made from 100% recycled plastic, so you can feel good about your choice for both your hair and the planet. **Experience the Biolage Difference:** Biolage is a leader in professional haircare, dedicated to providing salon-quality results at home. Our Color Last Shampoo is part of our comprehensive range of haircare solutions, designed to meet the unique needs of color-treated hair. Discover the power of Biolage and elevate your haircare routine today. **Usage:** For best results, apply Biolage Color Last Shampoo to wet hair, lather with a gentle massaging motion, and rinse thoroughly. Pair with Biolage Color Last Conditioner for optimal color protection and nourishment.
Professional By Nature. Honest By Choice. A recognized leader in haircare, BIOLAGE offers high-quality hair care products powered by botanicals

With warm notes of spun sugar, juicy pink grapefruit, and vanilla, it delivers a dreamy, decadent vibe. Just a few spritzes of this hair mist leave your hair smelling fresh and delicious all day.
PATENTED TECHNOLOGY THAT ELIMINATES ODORS: Unlike regular hair perfume sprays that just mask smells, our formula features patented odor-eliminating tech. It neutralizes unwanted odors at the source—transforming sweaty gym hair or second-day strands into fresh and clean in seconds.

The 50mL size is ideal for on-the-go freshness, and the bottle is made with 30% PCR material—because great hair days shouldn’t come at the planet’s expense.
YOUR DAILY DOSE OF FRESHNESS: Whether you're heading to work, hitting the gym, or jetting off for the weekend, this travel-sized vanilla hair perfume mist has your back. Available in five irresistible scents, it’s the perfect way to refresh your strands and feel instantly polished—no matter where the day takes you.

products.product_name: Men’s Rogaine 5% Minoxidil for Men Foam, Clinically Proven Regrowth for Thinning Hair, Topical Hair Loss Treatment, Unscented Topical Aerosol, Results in 8–16 Weeks, 3-Month Supply, 3 x 2.11 oz

products.description: Men’s Rogaine minoxidil for men foam is a clinically proven topical aerosol hair regrowth treatment featuring a 5% minoxidil formula to reactivate hair follicles and help regrow fuller, thicker hair. Designed for the early stages of thinning at the vertex (top of the scalp), this unscented minoxidil for men foam leverages Tricho-Prime Technology—a blend of botanical extracts, nourishing emollients, and alpha hydroxy acid (AHA)—to condition and gently exfoliate the scalp, help keep follicles open, and create an optimal environment for hair growth. Clinical studies show noticeable new hair regrowth in 12 weeks with consistent twice-daily use; individual timelines vary, and you may notice early signs between weeks 8–12 with fuller benefits around week 16. Because response can vary, you may experience initial shedding as weaker hairs make way for new growth; maintain consistent application to see the best results over time. To use, dispense approximately half a capful and apply directly to clean, dry thinning areas on the top of the scalp morning and night, gently massaging the product into the skin; allow it to dry completely before styling. The no-mess, quick-absorbing foam integrates seamlessly into daily routines and fits easily into your regular hair care regimen. Each pack provides a 3-month supply with three 2.11 oz bottles to support uninterrupted treatment and routine adherence. As a trusted hair loss treatment for men, this targeted foam penetrates the scalp to stimulate follicle activity and support hair protein production for visible regrowth with continued use. For best results, commit to consistent twice-daily application for at least 4 months to allow new growth to appear and mature; ongoing use is needed to maintain results. Rogaine is the #1 dermatologist-recommended hair growth product brand. If you’re ready to address hereditary hair loss at the vertex, choose the convenience of minoxidil for men foam and start your hair growth journey today.

products.description:
2x Faster Drying: Powered by a robust 1875W motor and advanced aerodynamic design, this ionic hair dryer delivers high-speed airflow to dry your hair twice as fast. Spend less time drying, avoid overheating, and minimize damage—all while achieving effortlessly sleek results.
Ionic Frizz Reduction: This hair dryer releases millions of negative ions during use, neutralizing static, taming frizz, and boosting shine—leaving your hair smooth, glossy, and effortlessly polished.
3 Attachments for Every Style: A concentrated nozzle delivers precision airflow, allowing for targeted styling and greater control. The diffuser reduces frizz while enhancing and defining natural curls or waves. The comb attachment smooths and straightens, making it perfect for managing thick, unruly hair with ease.
3 Temperature Settings: With three temperature settings and two airflow speeds (including a cool air option), this device offers customizable versatility for every hair type, turning your daily hair care routine into an effortless, salon-worthy experience.
Safety Protection & Low Radiation: Equipped with an automatic shutdown function to prevent overheating, this hair dryer with diffuser ensures safe use at all times. Additionally, its low electromagnetic wave technology reduces radiation by 50%, making it a safer choice for pregnant women and children.

products.product_name: Biolage Color Last Shampoo - For Color-Treated Hair, Nourishes, Strengthens, Hydrates and Adds Shine, Soybean Oil & Stearic Acid, Paraben & Mineral Oil-Free, Vegan, 33.8 Fl Oz
products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Hair Care > Shampoo & Conditioner > Shampoos
products.description:
**Biolage Color Last Shampoo: Vibrant Color, Lasting Shine** Experience the brilliance of Biolage Color Last Shampoo, your ultimate solution for color-treated hair. Infused with a powerful blend of soybean oil and stearic acid, this low-pH formula gently cleanses while preserving your hair's vibrant color and radiant shine. Say goodbye to dullness and fading, and embrace locks that stay true to tone, wash after wash. **Key Benefits:** - Preserves color depth and tone - Enhances shine and smoothness - Nourishes and strengthens hair - Prevents color fade for up to 4 weeks* - Delivers 35% more shine after just one use* - Makes hair 13x smoother and 2x stronger* **How It Works:** Our carefully calibrated color care concentrate, featuring antioxidant-rich soybean oil and protective stearic acid, forms a lightweight veil over each strand, shielding it from color-damaging aggressors. This dynamic duo nourishes, conditions, and seals in moisture, leaving your color-treated hair feeling soft, smooth, and irresistibly healthy. **A Sustainable Choice:** At Biolage, we believe in beauty without compromise. Our Color Last Shampoo is proudly vegan, cruelty-free, and formulated without parabens, mineral oil, or colorants. Plus, our bottles and caps are made from 100% recycled plastic, so you can feel good about your choice for both your hair and the planet. **Experience the Biolage Difference:** Biolage is a leader in professional haircare, dedicated to providing salon-quality results at home. Our Color Last Shampoo is part of our comprehensive range of haircare solutions, designed to meet the unique needs of color-treated hair. Discover the power of Biolage and elevate your haircare routine today. **Usage:** For best results, apply Biolage Color Last Shampoo to wet hair, lather with a gentle massaging motion, and rinse thoroughly. Pair with Biolage Color Last Conditioner for optimal color protection and nourishment.
Professional By Nature. Honest By Choice. A recognized leader in haircare, BIOLAGE offers high-quality hair care products powered by botanicals
features: Color Last Shampoo: Gently cleanses color-treated hair without stripping color. Nourishes and strengthens hair while hydrating. Ideal for maintaining vibrant color and high shine. Apply to wet hair, lather, and rinse thoroughly.
Benefits: This shampoo gently cleanses, nouishes and strengthens hair, while protecting color depth and adding shine.
Suggested Use: Apply to wet hair, lather, and rinse thoroughly. Follow with Color Last Conditioner.
Color Last Collection: Color Last system of Shampoo and Conditioner, nourishes and protects to help maintain the shine of color-treated hair. Color Last Shampoo with low pH prolongs color vibrancy

Our anti-thinning, volumizing shampoo and conditioner set gently cleanses while leaving your hair soft, healthy, and full of body. Infused with fresh, uplifting scents, it keeps your hair looking and smelling amazing all day long.

Medicated dandruff shampoo for all hair types, curl patterns, and color-treated hair, this shampoo for itchy scalp is your go-to for maintaining healthy looking hair. products.product_name: Kitsch Hair Perfume for Women - Warm Sugar | Clean, Deodorizing & Patented Odor-Eliminating Technology Hair Spray & Body Mist - Freshen Hair, Body & Pillows - Pink Grapefruit & Vanilla Scent - 50mL
products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Hair Care > Hair Fragrances
products.description:
SWEET, LONG-LASTING SCENT: This vanilla hair perfume for women wraps your strands in cotton candy bliss. With warm notes of spun sugar, juicy pink grapefruit, and vanilla, it delivers a dreamy, decadent vibe. Just a few spritzes of this hair mist leave your hair smelling fresh and delicious all day.
PATENTED TECHNOLOGY THAT ELIMINATES ODORS: Unlike regular hair perfume sprays that just mask smells, our formula features patented odor-eliminating tech. It neutralizes unwanted odors at the source—transforming sweaty gym hair or second-day strands into fresh and clean in seconds.
HAIR PERFUME + BODY MIST IN ONE: More than just a hair perfume spray, this multitasking mist refreshes hair, body—even your Kitsch Satin Pillowcase. Whether you need a midday reset or a post-workout pick-me-up, this sweet-smelling spray adds a quick boost of scent, anywhere, anytime.
CLEAN INGREDIENTS, CONSCIOUS FORMULA: Our Kitsch Hair Perfume is vegan, cruelty-free, and free from phthalates, parabens, PFAS, and synthetic CMRs. The 50mL size is ideal for on-the-go freshness, and the bottle is made with 30% PCR material—because great hair days shouldn’t come at the planet’s expense.
YOUR DAILY DOSE OF FRESHNESS: Whether you're heading to work, hitting the gym, or jetting off for the weekend, this travel-sized vanilla hair perfume mist has your back. Available in five irresistible scents, it’s the perfect way to refresh your strands and feel instantly polished—no matter where the day takes you.

products.product_name: Men’s Rogaine 5% Minoxidil for Men Foam, Clinically Proven Regrowth for Thinning Hair, Topical Hair Loss Treatment, Unscented Topical Aerosol, Results in 8–16 Weeks, 3-Month Supply, 3 x 2.11 oz

products.description: Men’s Rogaine minoxidil for men foam is a clinically proven topical aerosol hair regrowth treatment featuring a 5% minoxidil formula to reactivate hair follicles and help regrow fuller, thicker hair. Designed for the early stages of thinning at the vertex (top of the scalp), this unscented minoxidil for men foam leverages Tricho-Prime Technology—a blend of botanical extracts, nourishing emollients, and alpha hydroxy acid (AHA)—to condition and gently exfoliate the scalp, help keep follicles open, and create an optimal environment for hair growth. Clinical studies show noticeable new hair regrowth in 12 weeks with consistent twice-daily use; individual timelines vary, and you may notice early signs between weeks 8–12 with fuller benefits around week 16. Because response can vary, you may experience initial shedding as weaker hairs make way for new growth; maintain consistent application to see the best results over time. To use, dispense approximately half a capful and apply directly to clean, dry thinning areas on the top of the scalp morning and night, gently massaging the product into the skin; allow it to dry completely before styling. The no-mess, quick-absorbing foam integrates seamlessly into daily routines and fits easily into your regular hair care regimen. Each pack provides a 3-month supply with three 2.11 oz bottles to support uninterrupted treatment and routine adherence. As a trusted hair loss treatment for men, this targeted foam penetrates the scalp to stimulate follicle activity and support hair protein production for visible regrowth with continued use. For best results, commit to consistent twice-daily application for at least 4 months to allow new growth to appear and mature; ongoing use is needed to maintain results. Rogaine is the #1 dermatologist-recommended hair growth product brand. If you’re ready to address hereditary hair loss at the vertex, choose the convenience of minoxidil for men foam and start your hair growth journey today.

products.product_name: Biolage Color Last Shampoo - For Color-Treated Hair, Nourishes, Strengthens, Hydrates and Adds Shine, Soybean Oil & Stearic Acid, Paraben & Mineral Oil-Free, Vegan, 33.8 Fl Oz
products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Hair Care > Shampoo & Conditioner > Shampoos
products.description:
**Biolage Color Last Shampoo: Vibrant Color, Lasting Shine** Experience the brilliance of Biolage Color Last Shampoo, your ultimate solution for color-treated hair. Infused with a powerful blend of soybean oil and stearic acid, this low-pH formula gently cleanses while preserving your hair's vibrant color and radiant shine. Say goodbye to dullness and fading, and embrace locks that stay true to tone, wash after wash. **Key Benefits:** - Preserves color depth and tone - Enhances shine and smoothness - Nourishes and strengthens hair - Prevents color fade for up to 4 weeks* - Delivers 35% more shine after just one use* - Makes hair 13x smoother and 2x stronger* **How It Works:** Our carefully calibrated color care concentrate, featuring antioxidant-rich soybean oil and protective stearic acid, forms a lightweight veil over each strand, shielding it from color-damaging aggressors. This dynamic duo nourishes, conditions, and seals in moisture, leaving your color-treated hair feeling soft, smooth, and irresistibly healthy. **A Sustainable Choice:** At Biolage, we believe in beauty without compromise. Our Color Last Shampoo is proudly vegan, cruelty-free, and formulated without parabens, mineral oil, or colorants. Plus, our bottles and caps are made from 100% recycled plastic, so you can feel good about your choice for both your hair and the planet. **Experience the Biolage Difference:** Biolage is a leader in professional haircare, dedicated to providing salon-quality results at home. Our Color Last Shampoo is part of our comprehensive range of haircare solutions, designed to meet the unique needs of color-treated hair. Discover the power of Biolage and elevate your haircare routine today. **Usage:** For best results, apply Biolage Color Last Shampoo to wet hair, lather with a gentle massaging motion, and rinse thoroughly. Pair with Biolage Color Last Conditioner for optimal color protection and nourishment.
Professional By Nature. Honest By Choice. A recognized leader in haircare, BIOLAGE offers high-quality hair care products powered by botanicals

products.product_name: Men’s Rogaine 5% Minoxidil for Men Foam, Clinically Proven Regrowth for Thinning Hair, Topical Hair Loss Treatment, Unscented Topical Aerosol, Results in 8–16 Weeks, 3-Month Supply, 3 x 2.11 oz
products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Hair Care > Hair Loss Products > Hair Regrowth Treatments
products.description: Men’s Rogaine minoxidil for men foam is a clinically proven topical aerosol hair regrowth treatment featuring a 5% minoxidil formula to reactivate hair follicles and help regrow fuller, thicker hair. Designed for the early stages of thinning at the vertex (top of the scalp), this unscented minoxidil for men foam leverages Tricho-Prime Technology—a blend of botanical extracts, nourishing emollients, and alpha hydroxy acid (AHA)—to condition and gently exfoliate the scalp, help keep follicles open, and create an optimal environment for hair growth. Clinical studies show noticeable new hair regrowth in 12 weeks with consistent twice-daily use; individual timelines vary, and you may notice early signs between weeks 8–12 with fuller benefits around week 16. Because response can vary, you may experience initial shedding as weaker hairs make way for new growth; maintain consistent application to see the best results over time. To use, dispense approximately half a capful and apply directly to clean, dry thinning areas on the top of the scalp morning and night, gently massaging the product into the skin; allow it to dry completely before styling. The no-mess, quick-absorbing foam integrates seamlessly into daily routines and fits easily into your regular hair care regimen. Each pack provides a 3-month supply with three 2.11 oz bottles to support uninterrupted treatment and routine adherence. As a trusted hair loss treatment for men, this targeted foam penetrates the scalp to stimulate follicle activity and support hair protein production for visible regrowth with continued use. For best results, commit to consistent twice-daily application for at least 4 months to allow new growth to appear and mature; ongoing use is needed to maintain results. Rogaine is the #1 dermatologist-recommended hair growth product brand. If you’re ready to address hereditary hair loss at the vertex, choose the convenience of minoxidil for men foam and start your hair growth journey today.
features: Clinical hair regrowth: Clinically proven to improve hair regrowth by 4x versus control at 16 weeks; unscented topical aerosol foam, 3-month supply, apply half-capful twice daily on scalp to regrow fuller, thicker hair and reverse hereditary hair loss.

Scalp conditioning technology: Tricho-Prime technology with botanical extracts and emollients conditions scalp and keeps follicles open; alpha hydroxy acid (AHA) exfoliates gently to enhance minoxidil absorption and support hair growth products.

Targeted thinning hair treatment: Minoxidil for men foam stimulates hair follicle activity and boosts hair protein production; formulated for men with general thinning at the top of the scalp to promote fuller, denser hair regrowth.

Easy daily application: Unscented, no-mess foam fits seamlessly into your hair care and hair growth routine; this 5% minoxidil topical hair loss treatment applies in a half-capful twice daily on clean, dry scalp for a full 3-month supply.

Brand trust and efficacy: From the #1 dermatologist-recommended Rogaine, this 5% minoxidil foam for men is clinically proven to reverse hereditary hair loss and deliver visible regrowth; scientifically validated in clinical studies.

products.product_name: Biolage Color Last Shampoo - For Color-Treated Hair, Nourishes, Strengthens, Hydrates and Adds Shine, Soybean Oil & Stearic Acid, Paraben & Mineral Oil-Free, Vegan, 33.8 Fl Oz
products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Hair Care > Shampoo & Conditioner > Shampoos
products.description:
**Biolage Color Last Shampoo: Vibrant Color, Lasting Shine** Experience the brilliance of Biolage Color Last Shampoo, your ultimate solution for color-treated hair. Infused with a powerful blend of soybean oil and stearic acid, this low-pH formula gently cleanses while preserving your hair's vibrant color and radiant shine. Say goodbye to dullness and fading, and embrace locks that stay true to tone, wash after wash. **Key Benefits:** - Preserves color depth and tone - Enhances shine and smoothness - Nourishes and strengthens hair - Prevents color fade for up to 4 weeks* - Delivers 35% more shine after just one use* - Makes hair 13x smoother and 2x stronger* **How It Works:** Our carefully calibrated color care concentrate, featuring antioxidant-rich soybean oil and protective stearic acid, forms a lightweight veil over each strand, shielding it from color-damaging aggressors. This dynamic duo nourishes, conditions, and seals in moisture, leaving your color-treated hair feeling soft, smooth, and irresistibly healthy. **A Sustainable Choice:** At Biolage, we believe in beauty without compromise. Our Color Last Shampoo is proudly vegan, cruelty-free, and formulated without parabens, mineral oil, or colorants. Plus, our bottles and caps are made from 100% recycled plastic, so you can feel good about your choice for both your hair and the planet. **Experience the Biolage Difference:** Biolage is a leader in professional haircare, dedicated to providing salon-quality results at home. Our Color Last Shampoo is part of our comprehensive range of haircare solutions, designed to meet the unique needs of color-treated hair. Discover the power of Biolage and elevate your haircare routine today. **Usage:** For best results, apply Biolage Color Last Shampoo to wet hair, lather with a gentle massaging motion, and rinse thoroughly. Pair with Biolage Color Last Conditioner for optimal color protection and nourishment.
Professional By Nature. Honest By Choice. A recognized leader in haircare, BIOLAGE offers high-quality hair care products powered by botanicals

To change out the AAA battery simply remove cap, hold trimmer body with one hand and pinch the trimmer head with your index finger and thumb with the other hand then gently pull up on the trimmer head. This will give you access to the battery tray. Replace bad battery and simply slide trimmer back into the metal sleeve. To remove the trimmer head pinch the head between your index finger and thumb then turn counterclockwise a quarter turn and lift away from the trimmer body. To replace the head, align the notches on the head with the channel on the trimmer body, press down and turn a quarter turn clockwise until it locks into place. Wahl clippers & trimmers are available in a variety of styles to meet your home hair cutting needs. Note: We test our trimmers for cutting performance prior to packaging with a hygienic fiber. We do our best to clean the product to remove any testing particles, but it is possible a few may remain. products.description:
The Philips Norelco OneBlade 360 is a revolutionary new hair removal device for men designed for those who wear facial styles, beards, or stubble. Forget about using multiple steps and tools. OneBlade does it all.
 
 Its shaving technology features a fast-moving cutter that moves up to 12,000x per minute and powers through any length of hair. The dual-protection system, a glide coating combined with rounded tips, makes shaving easier for even more comfortable hair removal. The innovative 360 Blade can flex in all directions to adjust to the curves of your face. The design enables constant skin contact and control. 
 
 Easily trim and shave hard‐to‐reach areas, with fewer strokes and greater comfort¹. Create precise edges with the dual-sided blade. You can shave in either direction to get great visibility and see every hair that you're cutting. Line up your style in seconds! 
 
 This hair trimmer for men doesn't shave as close as a traditional blade - so your skin stays safe and comfortable. Unique 5-in-1 open comb design provides an efficient trim without clogging and interrupting your routine, even on long and thick hair. 
 
 OneBlade is fully waterproof, so it's easy to clean. Just rinse it under the tap. You can also use it wet or dry, with or without foam, creams, gel, or in the shower, making this a great trimmer/razor choice for men. Time to get your perfect facial style and stubble.
 
 Stainless steel blade lasts up to 4 months of use² to keep that fresh feel. An eject icon will appear on the blade when it's time to consider changing the blade for the best shaving experience. Fully rechargeable, the OneBlade 360 Face delivers 45 minutes of continuous shaving power after an 8-hour charge. USB-A charging cable included (wall power adapter not included).
 
 ¹ vs. its predecessor while shaving
 ² Replace every 4 months for the best shaving experience. Based on 2 full shaves per week. Actual results may vary.
 ³ 2 + 3 years warranty upon registration within 90 days on Philips.com or in the OneBlade app
features: For each OneBlade 360, QP2724/90 sold, Philips Norelco will donate up to 1 dollar to Movember in support of men’s health initiatives
OneBlade Technology: the fast-moving cutter (12,000x min) is efficient, even on longer hairs; the dual Protection System with glide coating plus rounded tips makes shaving easier and more comfortable
Innovative 360 Blade: it can flex in all directions to enable constant skin contact and control; easily trim and shave, even the most difficult-to-reach areas with fewer passes and greater comfort
Designed to cut hair not skin: trim your beard to an even stubble length with the 5in1 comb (1-5mm), create precise edges thanks to the dual-sided blade, and shave off any length of hair easily
Easy grooming anywhere: take it in the shower and use wet or dry; 45-minute battery with USB charging and compact handle make it the perfect travel companion
Does not become blunt easily: stainless steel blade that lasts up to 4 months of use to keep that fresh feel; an eject icon will appear on the blade when it's time for a new one
Perfect your style and extend your warranty up to 5 years
The set includes: 1x Philips Norelco OneBlade 360, 1x 360 Blade, 1x 5in1 adjustable comb (1-5mm), 1x protection cap, 1x USB-A charging cable, a user manual (power adapter not included)

products.description: Now live more spontaneous moments with Veet Hair Remover Cream that removes even stubborn hair in just few minutes. Enriched with active ingredients such as Aloe Vera and Vitamin E, this hair removal cream for women moisturizes, leaving your skin feeling smooth and soft. The sensitive hair removal cream comes with delightful fragrance of Vanilla and Passion Fruit for a satisfying and breathtaking experience. This aloe vera hair removal cream is dermatologically tested and can be used for legs, arms, underarms and bikini hair removal. The results of Veet may last up to twice as long as shaving. It comes in a pump bottle with a spatula for easy dispensing, applying and removal. Suitable for: Creams can be used by everyone, including pregnant women. Teenagers under 16 are supposed to be supervised by an adult when using any depilatory method. Caution: Before every use, test your skin by applying and removing the product to a small part of the area as skin is a sensitive part of the body. If after 24 hours, there is no adverse reaction, continue to use. Veet cream is not suitable for use on head, face, eyes, nose, ears, around the anus, genitals and nipples. Read pack for full instructions before use. Do not exceed 10 minutes total application time.

products.product_name: Amazon Basics 5-Blade MotionSphere Men's Razor with Dual Lubrication and Precision Trimmer, 17 Piece Set, 1 Handle & 16 Cartridges, Black

products.description: Amazon Basics 5-Blade MotionSphere Razor for Men features a multi pivot design to follow the contours of your face and a beard trimmer for shaving goatee, sideburns and under nose. The razor cartridge is hypoallergenic, includes a lubricating strip with vitamin E, and has an anti-clog design for quick rinse. To load refill cartridge, push razor handle into a cartridge as it sits in the dispenser until it clicks. Cartridges fit Amazon Basics Razor Handles only; does not fit other brands. INSTRUCTIONS: 1. Prepare: Wash your face with warm water to remove dirt and oils. Apply a pre-shave oil (optional). 2. Lather: Apply shaving cream or gel to your face using a brush or directly with your hands. 3. Shave: Use a razor to shave in the direction of hair growth, using short and light strokes, rinsing the razor frequently. For a closer shave, you can reapply shaving cream/gel and shave against the grain (opposite direction of hair growth). However, be cautious as this may increase the risk of skin irritation or ingrown hairs. 4. Soothe: Rinse your face, pat dry, and apply an aftershave lotion or balm to moisturize and soothe the skin. 5. Store: Shake off excess water after use and store your razor in a clean, dry place.

products.description: Wahl’s 2-in-1 Micro Groomsman is the complete ear and nose hair trimmer for men that will meet all your styling and grooming needs. Perfect for trimming beards, nose, and ear hair, we’ve thought of everything you could need to recreate your favorite styles every time at home, traveling, or on the go! The Wahl 2 in 1 Pen Trimmer includes Detail Head, Rotary Head, Eyebrow Guide, Protective Cap, & English & Spanish Instructions. Our micro personal trimmer features superior blades, rugged anodized aluminum housing, with enough performance, power, & run time to achieve the perfect look on the go or at home. Perfect for facial hair detailing with the Detail Head; Perfect for any area needing light hair removal such as nose, ear, brow, sideburn, toes, & touch-ups on the neckline. To change out the AAA battery simply remove cap, hold trimmer body with one hand and pinch the trimmer head with your index finger and thumb with the other hand then gently pull up on the trimmer head. This will give you access to the battery tray. Replace bad battery and simply slide trimmer back into the metal sleeve. To remove the trimmer head pinch the head between your index finger and thumb then turn counterclockwise a quarter turn and lift away from the trimmer body. To replace the head, align the notches on the head with the channel on the trimmer body, press down and turn a quarter turn clockwise until it locks into place. Wahl clippers & trimmers are available in a variety of styles to meet your home hair cutting needs. From Lithium-Ion cordless & rechargeable clippers to heavy-duty corded models, Wahl nose trimmer for men deliver a high-performance cut every time. Wahl clippers and trimmers have been used by professionals in the salon & barber industry since 1919. With self-sharpening precision blades & quality construction, Wahl clippers, shavers & trimmers deliver a smooth shave. The eyebrow trimmer for men in packaging may not be the same as photo due to continuous improvements to the product. Note: We test our trimmers for cutting performance prior to packaging with a hygienic fiber. We do our best to clean the product to remove any testing particles, but it is possible a few may remain. They are not hair and can be simply wiped off.

products.product_name: Norelco Philips OneBlade 360 Hybrid Face, Electric Beard Trimmer and Shaver, with 360 Blade Technology, 1x 360 Blade for Face, 5in1 Adjustable Comb, Model QP2724/90
products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Shave & Hair Removal > Men's > Electric Shavers > Foil Shavers
products.description:
The Philips Norelco OneBlade 360 is a revolutionary new hair removal device for men designed for those who wear facial styles, beards, or stubble. Forget about using multiple steps and tools. OneBlade does it all.
 
 Its shaving technology features a fast-moving cutter that moves up to 12,000x per minute and powers through any length of hair. The dual-protection system, a glide coating combined with rounded tips, makes shaving easier for even more comfortable hair removal. The innovative 360 Blade can flex in all directions to adjust to the curves of your face. The design enables constant skin contact and control. 
 
 Easily trim and shave hard‐to‐reach areas, with fewer strokes and greater comfort¹. Create precise edges with the dual-sided blade. You can shave in either direction to get great visibility and see every hair that you're cutting. Line up your style in seconds! 
 
 This hair trimmer for men doesn't shave as close as a traditional blade - so your skin stays safe and comfortable. Unique 5-in-1 open comb design provides an efficient trim without clogging and interrupting your routine, even on long and thick hair. 
 
 OneBlade is fully waterproof, so it's easy to clean. Just rinse it under the tap. You can also use it wet or dry, with or without foam, creams, gel, or in the shower, making this a great trimmer/razor choice for men. Time to get your perfect facial style and stubble.
 
 Stainless steel blade lasts up to 4 months of use² to keep that fresh feel. An eject icon will appear on the blade when it's time to consider changing the blade for the best shaving experience. Fully rechargeable, the OneBlade 360 Face delivers 45 minutes of continuous shaving power after an 8-hour charge. USB-A charging cable included (wall power adapter not included).
 
 ¹ vs. its predecessor while shaving
 ² Replace every 4 months for the best shaving experience. Based on 2 full shaves per week. Actual results may vary.
 ³ 2 + 3 years warranty upon registration within 90 days on Philips.com or in the OneBlade app

Enriched with active ingredients such as Aloe Vera and Vitamin E, this hair removal cream for women moisturizes, leaving your skin feeling smooth and soft. The sensitive hair removal cream comes with delightful fragrance of Vanilla and Passion Fruit for a satisfying and breathtaking experience. This aloe vera hair removal cream is dermatologically tested and can be used for legs, arms, underarms and bikini hair removal. The results of Veet may last up to twice as long as shaving. It comes in a pump bottle with a spatula for easy dispensing, applying and removal. Suitable for: Creams can be used by everyone, including pregnant women. Teenagers under 16 are supposed to be supervised by an adult when using any depilatory method. Caution: Before every use, test your skin by applying and removing the product to a small part of the area as skin is a sensitive part of the body. If after 24 hours, there is no adverse reaction, continue to use. Veet cream is not suitable for use on head, face, eyes, nose, ears, around the anus, genitals and nipples. Read pack for full instructions before use. Do not exceed 10 minutes total application time.
features: [COMMONLY SEARCHED TOPICS]: body hair removal, depilatory, depilatory cream, epilation, epilator, hair removal, hair removal cream, hair remover, leg hair removal, hair trimmer, facial hair removal, bikini hair removal

Trust the #1 Electric shaver brand¹ and choose Philips Norelco Shaver 22400 Series: wet and dry electric shaver that gives you a fast, clean shave, even on sensitive skin.
 
 Its 27 self-sharpening ComfortCut Blades have a 2-year lifetime which makes your shaver perform like new every day. products.product_name: Amazon Basics 5-Blade MotionSphere Men's Razor with Dual Lubrication and Precision Trimmer, 17 Piece Set, 1 Handle & 16 Cartridges, Black
products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Shave & Hair Removal > Men's > Razors & Blades > Cartridge Razors
products.description: Amazon Basics 5-Blade MotionSphere Razor for Men features a multi pivot design to follow the contours of your face and a beard trimmer for shaving goatee, sideburns and under nose. The razor cartridge is hypoallergenic, includes a lubricating strip with vitamin E, and has an anti-clog design for quick rinse. To load refill cartridge, push razor handle into a cartridge as it sits in the dispenser until it clicks. Cartridges fit Amazon Basics Razor Handles only; does not fit other brands. INSTRUCTIONS: 1. Prepare: Wash your face with warm water to remove dirt and oils. Apply a pre-shave oil (optional). 2. Lather: Apply shaving cream or gel to your face using a brush or directly with your hands. 3. Shave: Use a razor to shave in the direction of hair growth, using short and light strokes, rinsing the razor frequently. For a closer shave, you can reapply shaving cream/gel and shave against the grain (opposite direction of hair growth). However, be cautious as this may increase the risk of skin irritation or ingrown hairs. 4. Soothe: Rinse your face, pat dry, and apply an aftershave lotion or balm to moisturize and soothe the skin. 5. Store: Shake off excess water after use and store your razor in a clean, dry place.
features: 5-blade MotionSphere razor handle and 16 refill cartridges
Hypoallergenic lubricating strips with Vitamin E to help reduce skin irritation
Anti-clog design for quick rinse
Beard trimmer for shaving goatee, sideburns, and under nose
Cartridges fit Amazon Basics Razor Handles only; does not fit other brands
MotionSphere multi axis pivot follows the contours of the face

products.description: Wahl’s 2-in-1 Micro Groomsman is the complete ear and nose hair trimmer for men that will meet all your styling and grooming needs. To change out the AAA battery simply remove cap, hold trimmer body with one hand and pinch the trimmer head with your index finger and thumb with the other hand then gently pull up on the trimmer head. This will give you access to the battery tray. Replace bad battery and simply slide trimmer back into the metal sleeve. To remove the trimmer head pinch the head between your index finger and thumb then turn counterclockwise a quarter turn and lift away from the trimmer body. To replace the head, align the notches on the head with the channel on the trimmer body, press down and turn a quarter turn clockwise until it locks into place. Note: We test our trimmers for cutting performance prior to packaging with a hygienic fiber. We do our best to clean the product to remove any testing particles, but it is possible a few may remain. products.product_name: Norelco Philips OneBlade 360 Hybrid Face, Electric Beard Trimmer and Shaver, with 360 Blade Technology, 1x 360 Blade for Face, 5in1 Adjustable Comb, Model QP2724/90
products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Shave & Hair Removal > Men's > Electric Shavers > Foil Shavers
products.description:
The Philips Norelco OneBlade 360 is a revolutionary new hair removal device for men designed for those who wear facial styles, beards, or stubble. Forget about using multiple steps and tools. OneBlade does it all.
 
 Its shaving technology features a fast-moving cutter that moves up to 12,000x per minute and powers through any length of hair. The dual-protection system, a glide coating combined with rounded tips, makes shaving easier for even more comfortable hair removal. The innovative 360 Blade can flex in all directions to adjust to the curves of your face. The design enables constant skin contact and control. 
 
 Easily trim and shave hard‐to‐reach areas, with fewer strokes and greater comfort¹. Create precise edges with the dual-sided blade. You can shave in either direction to get great visibility and see every hair that you're cutting. Line up your style in seconds! 
 
 This hair trimmer for men doesn't shave as close as a traditional blade - so your skin stays safe and comfortable. Unique 5-in-1 open comb design provides an efficient trim without clogging and interrupting your routine, even on long and thick hair. 
 
 OneBlade is fully waterproof, so it's easy to clean. Just rinse it under the tap. You can also use it wet or dry, with or without foam, creams, gel, or in the shower, making this a great trimmer/razor choice for men. Time to get your perfect facial style and stubble.
 
 Stainless steel blade lasts up to 4 months of use² to keep that fresh feel. An eject icon will appear on the blade when it's time to consider changing the blade for the best shaving experience. Fully rechargeable, the OneBlade 360 Face delivers 45 minutes of continuous shaving power after an 8-hour charge. USB-A charging cable included (wall power adapter not included).
 
 ¹ vs. its predecessor while shaving
 ² Replace every 4 months for the best shaving experience. Based on 2 full shaves per week. Actual results may vary.
 ³ 2 + 3 years warranty upon registration within 90 days on Philips.com or in the OneBlade app
features: For each OneBlade 360, QP2724/90 sold, Philips Norelco will donate up to 1 dollar to Movember in support of men’s health initiatives
OneBlade Technology: the fast-moving cutter (12,000x min) is efficient, even on longer hairs; the dual Protection System with glide coating plus rounded tips makes shaving easier and more comfortable
Innovative 360 Blade: it can flex in all directions to enable constant skin contact and control; easily trim and shave, even the most difficult-to-reach areas with fewer passes and greater comfort
Designed to cut hair not skin: trim your beard to an even stubble length with the 5in1 comb (1-5mm), create precise edges thanks to the dual-sided blade, and shave off any length of hair easily
Easy grooming anywhere: take it in the shower and use wet or dry; 45-minute battery with USB charging and compact handle make it the perfect travel companion
Does not become blunt easily: stainless steel blade that lasts up to 4 months of use to keep that fresh feel; an eject icon will appear on the blade when it's time for a new one
Perfect your style and extend your warranty up to 5 years
The set includes: 1x Philips Norelco OneBlade 360, 1x 360 Blade, 1x 5in1 adjustable comb (1-5mm), 1x protection cap, 1x USB-A charging cable, a user manual (power adapter not included)

The razor cartridge is hypoallergenic, includes a lubricating strip with vitamin E, and has an anti-clog design for quick rinse. To load refill cartridge, push razor handle into a cartridge as it sits in the dispenser until it clicks. Cartridges fit Amazon Basics Razor Handles only; does not fit other brands. INSTRUCTIONS: 1. Prepare: Wash your face with warm water to remove dirt and oils. Apply a pre-shave oil (optional). 2. Lather: Apply shaving cream or gel to your face using a brush or directly with your hands. 3. Shave: Use a razor to shave in the direction of hair growth, using short and light strokes, rinsing the razor frequently. For a closer shave, you can reapply shaving cream/gel and shave against the grain (opposite direction of hair growth). However, be cautious as this may increase the risk of skin irritation or ingrown hairs. 4. Soothe: Rinse your face, pat dry, and apply an aftershave lotion or balm to moisturize and soothe the skin. 5. Store: Shake off excess water after use and store your razor in a clean, dry place.

products.description: Loving your Billie razor? YAY! Now it’s time to grab some fresh blades to stay smooth anytime, anywhere. The Billie Razor Refill Blades are designed specifically for the way women shave–no more men’s razors! They are made with 5 ultra-sharp blades to help you get a close shave, and they’re encased in 360º of aloe shave soap to help your razor effortlessly float over your skin like a cloud. Designed with optimal spacing between each blade to allow shave cream, soap and hair to pass on by—whether you’re shaving your legs, pits, toes or stomach—no one likes a clogged razor! These nickel-free blades give you an ultra-gentle, ultra-close and comfy shave. They’re dermatologist-approved for all skin types, including sensitive skin. Say bye to stubble, irritation, bumps and ingrowns! Get one pack to shave with for the next few weeks, or stock up with a few packs to keep the smooth going for months to come! Everyone shaves differently, but we recommend replacing your blades about every 7 shaves. Each pack comes with 4 refills. Looking for shave cream? We’ve got that too. Check out the award-winning Whipped Shave Cream to help your razor (with super-fresh new blades!) give you a smoooooth shave.

products.description: Wahl’s 2-in-1 Micro Groomsman is the complete ear and nose hair trimmer for men that will meet all your styling and grooming needs. To change out the AAA battery simply remove cap, hold trimmer body with one hand and pinch the trimmer head with your index finger and thumb with the other hand then gently pull up on the trimmer head. This will give you access to the battery tray. Replace bad battery and simply slide trimmer back into the metal sleeve. To remove the trimmer head pinch the head between your index finger and thumb then turn counterclockwise a quarter turn and lift away from the trimmer body. To replace the head, align the notches on the head with the channel on the trimmer body, press down and turn a quarter turn clockwise until it locks into place. Wahl clippers & trimmers are available in a variety of styles to meet your home hair cutting needs. From Lithium-Ion cordless & rechargeable clippers to heavy-duty corded models, Wahl nose trimmer for men deliver a high-performance cut every time. With self-sharpening precision blades & quality construction, Wahl clippers, shavers & trimmers deliver a smooth shave. The eyebrow trimmer for men in packaging may not be the same as photo due to continuous improvements to the product. Note: We test our trimmers for cutting performance prior to packaging with a hygienic fiber. We do our best to clean the product to remove any testing particles, but it is possible a few may remain. They are not hair and can be simply wiped off.

products.description:
The Philips Norelco OneBlade 360 is a revolutionary new hair removal device for men designed for those who wear facial styles, beards, or stubble. Forget about using multiple steps and tools. OneBlade does it all.
 
 Its shaving technology features a fast-moving cutter that moves up to 12,000x per minute and powers through any length of hair. The dual-protection system, a glide coating combined with rounded tips, makes shaving easier for even more comfortable hair removal. The innovative 360 Blade can flex in all directions to adjust to the curves of your face. The design enables constant skin contact and control. 
 
 Easily trim and shave hard‐to‐reach areas, with fewer strokes and greater comfort¹. Create precise edges with the dual-sided blade. You can shave in either direction to get great visibility and see every hair that you're cutting. Line up your style in seconds! 
 
 This hair trimmer for men doesn't shave as close as a traditional blade - so your skin stays safe and comfortable. Unique 5-in-1 open comb design provides an efficient trim without clogging and interrupting your routine, even on long and thick hair. 
 
 OneBlade is fully waterproof, so it's easy to clean. Just rinse it under the tap. You can also use it wet or dry, with or without foam, creams, gel, or in the shower, making this a great trimmer/razor choice for men. Time to get your perfect facial style and stubble.
 
 Stainless steel blade lasts up to 4 months of use² to keep that fresh feel. An eject icon will appear on the blade when it's time to consider changing the blade for the best shaving experience. products.description: Say "goodbye" to stubble, irritation, nicks, and cuts and say "hello" to beautiful, hydrated skin with Tree Hut Bare Vanilla Moisturizing Shave Oil. Formulated with Shea Butter, Vanilla, Colloidal Gold, and a blend of four natural oils, this shaving oil soothes skin and helps prevent irritation, leaving your skin soft, smooth, and hydrated. The unique gel-to-oil formula provides a smooth glide and ample hydration, both during shaving and after rinsing off. Plus, it smells like warm, creamy vanilla with notes of warm sandalwood and coconut cream, adding a touch of indulgence to your bath and beauty rituals. Whether it's a thoughtful present for your wife, mother, or any special woman in your life, Tree Hut Bare Shave Oil is ideal for birthdays, holidays, and more. Tree Hut Moisturizing Shave Oils are alcohol-free, formaldehyde-free, paraben-free, sulfate-free, and vegan for a pampering experience she'll love. Apply to wet skin, shave, and rinse or wipe off for a silky-smooth finish. For an even closer shave, use Tree Hut Shea Sugar Scrub as an exfoliator prior to use!
features: VANILLA SHAVE OIL: Moisturizing shave oil helps prevent irritation, nicks, and cuts from shaving and provides ample skin hydration; Warm, creamy vanilla scent with notes of sandalwood and coconut cream
SKIN-LOVING INGREDIENTS: Formulated with Shea Butter, Vanilla, Colloidal Gold, and a blend of natural oils like Argan, Grapeseed, Jojoba, and Sesame Oils

SMOOTHEST SHAVE: Unique gel-to-oil formula provides ample hydration and a smooth glide you can feel during the shaving process and after rinse off; For an even closer shave, use Tree Hut Shea Sugar Scrub as an exfoliator before use

NOURISH AND SOFTEN DRY SKIN: Shea Butter helps deeply moisturize, nourish, and soften dry skin while helping promote skin elasticity; Vanilla contains antioxidant properties and hydrates skin; Colloidal Gold helps give the appearance of plump skin
ELEVATE YOUR SHAVE ROUTINE: Alcohol-free, formaldehyde-free, paraben-free, sulfate-free, and vegan; Apply to wet skin, shave, and rinse or wipe off for a silky-smooth finish

products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Shave & Hair Removal > Women's > Depilatories
products.description: Now live more spontaneous moments with Veet Hair Remover Cream that removes even stubborn hair in just few minutes. Enriched with active ingredients such as Aloe Vera and Vitamin E, this hair removal cream for women moisturizes, leaving your skin feeling smooth and soft. The sensitive hair removal cream comes with delightful fragrance of Vanilla and Passion Fruit for a satisfying and breathtaking experience. This aloe vera hair removal cream is dermatologically tested and can be used for legs, arms, underarms and bikini hair removal. The results of Veet may last up to twice as long as shaving. It comes in a pump bottle with a spatula for easy dispensing, applying and removal. Suitable for: Creams can be used by everyone, including pregnant women. Teenagers under 16 are supposed to be supervised by an adult when using any depilatory method. Caution: Before every use, test your skin by applying and removing the product to a small part of the area as skin is a sensitive part of the body. If after 24 hours, there is no adverse reaction, continue to use. Veet cream is not suitable for use on head, face, eyes, nose, ears, around the anus, genitals and nipples. Read pack for full instructions before use. Do not exceed 10 minutes total application time.

products.description:
Trust the #1 Electric shaver brand¹ and choose Philips Norelco Shaver 22400 Series: wet and dry electric shaver that gives you a fast, clean shave, even on sensitive skin.
 
 Its 27 self-sharpening ComfortCut Blades have a 2-year lifetime which makes your shaver perform like new every day. They cut each hair right above skin level for a smooth finish, while the 4D Pivot & Flex Heads follow your facial contour, protecting it from nicks and cuts.  Shave wet or dry and take care of defining your mustache or sideburns with the pop-up trimmer. Clean the device at the touch of a button with one-touch open to easily rinse under the tap. 
 
 A durable NiMH battery provides 40 minutes of shaving time on a single 1-hour charge. A 5-minute quick charge gives you enough power for one shave when in a hurry. Charge with a USB-A charging cable (power adapter not included).

products.description: Amazon Basics 5-Blade MotionSphere Razor for Men features a multi pivot design to follow the contours of your face and a beard trimmer for shaving goatee, sideburns and under nose. The razor cartridge is hypoallergenic, includes a lubricating strip with vitamin E, and has an anti-clog design for quick rinse. To load refill cartridge, push razor handle into a cartridge as it sits in the dispenser until it clicks. Cartridges fit Amazon Basics Razor Handles only; does not fit other brands. INSTRUCTIONS: 1. Prepare: Wash your face with warm water to remove dirt and oils. Apply a pre-shave oil (optional). 2. Lather: Apply shaving cream or gel to your face using a brush or directly with your hands. 3. Shave: Use a razor to shave in the direction of hair growth, using short and light strokes, rinsing the razor frequently. For a closer shave, you can reapply shaving cream/gel and shave against the grain (opposite direction of hair growth). However, be cautious as this may increase the risk of skin irritation or ingrown hairs. 4. Soothe: Rinse your face, pat dry, and apply an aftershave lotion or balm to moisturize and soothe the skin. 5. Store: Shake off excess water after use and store your razor in a clean, dry place.

products.product_name: Freebird FlexSeries Electric Head & Body Hair Shaver - Mens Cordless Rechargeable Wet/Dry Skull Bald Head Back & Groin Waterproof Razor with Rotary Blades, Clippers, Nose Trimmer, Brush, Massager

products.description:
SMOOTH SHAVE - Experience the number one benefit of this electric razor for men: a smooth shave. This high-quality electric shaver is designed for wet or dry use, with or without shaving cream. Its waterproof construction makes it extremely durable and shower-safe, perfect for grooming your head, body, and sensitive areas. The cordless design and long battery life, charged via rapid USB, provide ultimate convenience for travel.
FIVE ATTACHMENTS - The all-inclusive FlexSeries Electric Shaver for Men kit comes with 5 essential grooming attachments for before, during, and after shaving. The kit includes: a five-blade rotary shaving head, a precision clipper/trimmer with 3mm, 5mm, and 7mm safety guards for body hair, a nose & ear hair trimmer, a micro & plush skin exfoliation brush, and a deep cleansing massage pad. A rapid USB charging cable and a micro cleaning brush are also included.
EASY TO USE - The FlexSeries electric shavers for men are ergonomically designed for easy handling whether you're shaving your head, beard, body, or groin. It shaves right down to the skin without causing irritation such as bumps or cuts. Perfect for men who prefer a clean-shaven look but want to avoid the hassle of traditional razors. This versatile kit works as a full body shaver for men and also makes an excellent gift for your husband, partner, father, friend, or brother.
GET STARTED - Before your first use, fully charge your shaver for about 90 minutes. While charging, the unit will display a RED light; when ready to use, it will turn solid GREEN. Enjoy up to 90 minutes of cordless use. Replace the ScalpSafe rotary blade every 4 weeks, to maintain buttery smooth blade performance keeping them sharp and rust-free.

products.description: For the ultimate close, comfortable shave, use NIVEA MEN Sensitive Shave Gel. This shaving gel is specially formulated for men with sensitive skin, to soothe skin and help protect against shaving irritation. NIVEA MEN Sensitive Shave Gel is alcohol free and enriched with VitaminPro Complex—Vitamin E, Provitamin B5 and Chamomile extract—it cares for your skin while you shave. The gentle formula helps to protect your skin against the five signs of shave irritation: burning, micro cuts, dryness, tightness and stubble itch. This shave gel for men softens beard hair for a close and smooth shave, and it supports your skin's defense against dryness for resilient and healthy-looking skin. NIVEA cares for your skin and the planet, as this sensitive shave gel has a 99% biodegradable formula* and comes in a can made from 100% recycled aluminum**. Suitable for daily use, NIVEA MEN Sensitive Shave Gel is a key part of a skin and beard care routine. It pairs well with NIVEA MEN Sensitive Post Shave Balm and MEN Sensitive Face Moisturizer with Broad Spectrum SPF 15 Sunscreen as part of a daily skincare regimen. *as per OECD or equivalent methods **excluding plastic nozzle and cap

INCLUDES BLUSH, BRONZER, HIGHLIGHTER, AND EYESHADOW: These goodies are truly the best of our best! This all-in-one full face palette is the perfect introduction to our famous baked beauty. It includes a blush, bronzer, highlighter and three nude eyeshadows.
HANDMADE IN ITALY: Baked makes it better. Every formula in this eyeshadow, blush and highlighter palette starts out as a cream before being baked into a silky powder on terracotta tiles. Everything is artisan-made by hand in Italy.
ALL IN ONE PALETTE: These versatile, highly pigmented products sculpt, define, and highlight your features for flawless, all-day wear. Just start with your favorite foundation, add your favorite mascara and you’re ready to go!
HOW TO APPLY: Eyeshadows: Apply all over the lid. Use darker shades to define in the crease and blend lighter shades on browbone as a highlight., Highlighters: Dust across the tops of the cheekbones, down the bridge of the nose, and on the Cupid’s bow, Blush: Apply to apples of the cheeks for a fresh pop of color, Bronzer: Sweep all over your face to warm up your complexion or contour along the temples, hollows of the cheeks, and jawline for a more sculpted look.

products.description:
This all-in-one holiday makeup kit includes your perfect foundation, two limited-edition brushes, and an incredible full-face palette that includes eyeshadows, a blush, a bronzer, and a highlighter. It's everything you need for any event this season!
Don't get overwhelmed with holiday makeup! This complete makeup kit is the perfect way to get started on your baked makeup for mature skin journey. It has everything you need in an easy-to-use palette and compact. We even included two professional makeup brushes!
Like all of Laura Geller's iconic baked makeup, these products are handmade in Italy and feel completely weightless on skin. They never cake or crease in fine lines, making them a fantastic choice for mature skin.
A great option for seasoned beauty pros or mature skin newcomers alike, this makeup kit also makes a fantastic gift! Since it includes everything you need for a full face of makeup, there's no guesswork. We even included two versatile travel-friendly brushes!

products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Makeup > Makeup Palettes
products.description:
MULTICOLOR: Includes three baked neutral eyeshadows in subdued yet vibrant shades; a creamy bronze highlighter that infuses the skin with glamorous warm tones; light gold and champagne shades that instantly highlight with a single swipe; and a creamy peach-pink blush that delivers a naturally sweet flush.
INTENSE COLOR PIGMENTS: Each shade is enriched with highly concentrated pigments for rich, vibrant colors that create a striking and distinctive facial expression, with just one swipe for coverage.
CRAFTSMANSHIP: Highly pigmented powders allow you to mold your features to your heart's content, whether it's a natural look with soft contours or an eye-catching look with bold, dramatic effects.
LONG-LASTING MAKEUP: Using a premium formula, LLASIDO makeup stays vibrant and flawless for hours without fading or smudging, ensuring a perfect look all day long.
HOW TO USE: Eyeshadow: Sweep eyeshadow lightly over the entire eye socket, using darker shades to deepen the layering in the eye socket, and finish with a light highlight under the brow to create dimension. Highlight: Apply highlighter to cheekbones, bridge of nose and cupid's bow to create a natural glow and instantly enhance facial radiance. Blush: Apply blush to the cheeks and smudge for a fresh, vibrant look. Bronzer: Apply bronzing powder to the entire face or swipe it over the temples, cheekbone hollows and jawline to create a warm, contoured look that accentuates facial lines.

products.product_name: LAURA GELLER NEW YORK The Best of the Best Baked Palette - Full Size - Includes Bronzer, Blush, 2 Highlighters and 3 Eyeshadows - Travel-Friendly
products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Makeup > Makeup Palettes
products.description:
BEST OF THE BEST PALETTE: This complete eye and face makeup palette includes three baked eyeshadows in beautiful neutral tones, a Baked Bronze-n-Brighten in Tahitian Glow, twp Baked Natural Glow Highlighter in French Vanilla and Portofino and a Baked Blush-n-Brighten in Pink Buttercream.
INCLUDES BLUSH, BRONZER, HIGHLIGHTER, AND EYESHADOW: These goodies are truly the best of our best! This all-in-one full face palette is the perfect introduction to our famous baked beauty. It includes a blush, bronzer, highlighter and three nude eyeshadows.
HANDMADE IN ITALY: Baked makes it better. Every formula in this eyeshadow, blush and highlighter palette starts out as a cream before being baked into a silky powder on terracotta tiles. Everything is artisan-made by hand in Italy.
ALL IN ONE PALETTE: These versatile, highly pigmented products sculpt, define, and highlight your features for flawless, all-day wear. Just start with your favorite foundation, add your favorite mascara and you’re ready to go!
HOW TO APPLY: Eyeshadows: Apply all over the lid. Use darker shades to define in the crease and blend lighter shades on browbone as a highlight., Highlighters: Dust across the tops of the cheekbones, down the bridge of the nose, and on the Cupid’s bow, Blush: Apply to apples of the cheeks for a fresh pop of color, Bronzer: Sweep all over your face to warm up your complexion or contour along the temples, hollows of the cheeks, and jawline for a more sculpted look.

products.product_name: LAURA GELLER NEW YORK Baked Starter Kit- Baked Balance-n-Brighten, Fair + Best of the Best Tuscan Dreams Face Palette + Retractable Angled Kabuki Brush - Holiday 2025 Exclusive
products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Makeup > Makeup Palettes
products.description:
This all-in-one holiday makeup kit includes your perfect foundation, two limited-edition brushes, and an incredible full-face palette that includes eyeshadows, a blush, a bronzer, and a highlighter. It's everything you need for any event this season!
Don't get overwhelmed with holiday makeup! This complete makeup kit is the perfect way to get started on your baked makeup for mature skin journey. It has everything you need in an easy-to-use palette and compact. We even included two professional makeup brushes!
Like all of Laura Geller's iconic baked makeup, these products are handmade in Italy and feel completely weightless on skin. They never cake or crease in fine lines, making them a fantastic choice for mature skin.
A great option for seasoned beauty pros or mature skin newcomers alike, this makeup kit also makes a fantastic gift! Since it includes everything you need for a full face of makeup, there's no guesswork. We even included two versatile travel-friendly brushes!
Swirl the Retractable Angled Kabuki Brush onto Baked Balance-n-Brighten Foundation then blend on face. Repeat to build coverage. Use the larger side of the Dual-Ended Cheek + Eyeshadow Brush to apply bronzer, blush, and highlighter. Flip the brush to apply eyeshadows.

products.product_name: Best Baked Face Palette for Mature Skin – Includes Bronzer, Blush, Highlighter & Eyeshadows – Smooth Velvet Texture, Vegan & Cruelty-Free, Travel-Friendly Makeup Kit
products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Makeup > Makeup Palettes
products.description:
MULTICOLOR: Includes three baked neutral eyeshadows in subdued yet vibrant shades; a creamy bronze highlighter that infuses the skin with glamorous warm tones; light gold and champagne shades that instantly highlight with a single swipe; and a creamy peach-pink blush that delivers a naturally sweet flush.
INTENSE COLOR PIGMENTS: Each shade is enriched with highly concentrated pigments for rich, vibrant colors that create a striking and distinctive facial expression, with just one swipe for coverage.
CRAFTSMANSHIP: Highly pigmented powders allow you to mold your features to your heart's content, whether it's a natural look with soft contours or an eye-catching look with bold, dramatic effects.
LONG-LASTING MAKEUP: Using a premium formula, LLASIDO makeup stays vibrant and flawless for hours without fading or smudging, ensuring a perfect look all day long.
HOW TO USE: Eyeshadow: Sweep eyeshadow lightly over the entire eye socket, using darker shades to deepen the layering in the eye socket, and finish with a light highlight under the brow to create dimension. Highlight: Apply highlighter to cheekbones, bridge of nose and cupid's bow to create a natural glow and instantly enhance facial radiance. Blush: Apply blush to the cheeks and smudge for a fresh, vibrant look. Bronzer: Apply bronzing powder to the entire face or swipe it over the temples, cheekbone hollows and jawline to create a warm, contoured look that accentuates facial lines.

Perfect for creating a variety of looks, from subtle daytime elegance to bold, dramatic evening styles. This versatile palette is designed to meet all your daily makeup needs, ensuring you always look your best.

This innovative design makes it easy to experiment and find your ideal look, making it a must-have for both beginners and makeup enthusiasts.

The ultra-soft texture ensures easy application and blending, allowing you to create stunning looks with ease. Despite its compact size, this palette includes a comprehensive range of colors, making it perfect for travel and on-the-go touch-ups.
[Cruelty-Free Commitment] At COLORGRAM, we are dedicated to providing cruelty-free beauty products. Our eyeshadow palette, along with all our products, is not tested on animals, allowing you to enhance your beauty routine with a clear conscience. Enjoy the high quality and ethical standards of COLORGRAM while looking fabulous.

products.product_name: LAURA GELLER NEW YORK The Best of the Best Baked Palette - Full Size - Includes Bronzer, Blush, 2 Highlighters and 3 Eyeshadows - Travel-Friendly
products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Makeup > Makeup Palettes
products.description:
BEST OF THE BEST PALETTE: This complete eye and face makeup palette includes three baked eyeshadows in beautiful neutral tones, a Baked Bronze-n-Brighten in Tahitian Glow, twp Baked Natural Glow Highlighter in French Vanilla and Portofino and a Baked Blush-n-Brighten in Pink Buttercream.
INCLUDES BLUSH, BRONZER, HIGHLIGHTER, AND EYESHADOW: These goodies are truly the best of our best! This all-in-one full face palette is the perfect introduction to our famous baked beauty. It includes a blush, bronzer, highlighter and three nude eyeshadows.
HANDMADE IN ITALY: Baked makes it better. Every formula in this eyeshadow, blush and highlighter palette starts out as a cream before being baked into a silky powder on terracotta tiles. Everything is artisan-made by hand in Italy.
ALL IN ONE PALETTE: These versatile, highly pigmented products sculpt, define, and highlight your features for flawless, all-day wear. Just start with your favorite foundation, add your favorite mascara and you’re ready to go!
HOW TO APPLY: Eyeshadows: Apply all over the lid. Use darker shades to define in the crease and blend lighter shades on browbone as a highlight., Highlighters: Dust across the tops of the cheekbones, down the bridge of the nose, and on the Cupid’s bow, Blush: Apply to apples of the cheeks for a fresh pop of color, Bronzer: Sweep all over your face to warm up your complexion or contour along the temples, hollows of the cheeks, and jawline for a more sculpted look.

GELLER'S GREATEST LIFT-N-GLOW TRIO: This powder face contouring palette contains three of Laura's fan-favorite baked beauty favorites that work for all skin tones, Tahitian Glow Baked Body Frosting, Pink Grapefruit Baked Blush-n-Brighten, and Toasted Coconut Baked Natural Glow Highlighter
BRONZER, HIGHLIGHT, BLUSH PALETTE: Three is truly better than one, especially when it comes to luminous baked beauty. This face palette from Laura Geller includes 3 bestsellers - a body frosting bronzer, radiant blush, and luminous highlighter - all in universal shades to flatter any skin tone.
ALL IN ONE PALETTE: Love to switch it up? With three gorgeous multidimensional baked bronzers, blushes, and highlighters for face to choose from, you’ll have endless combinations to try. Plus, this contouring palette makes it easy to sculpt your face too.
PERFECT FOR: Mature Skin, Sallow Skin, Highlighting
HOW TO APPLY: Using your Retractable Angled Kabuki Brush, apply bronzer in a "3" shape from the temples, cheekbone, and jawline. Use the same brush to apply the blush to the apples of the cheek. Finish by applying the highlighter on the bridge of the nose, cheekbones or wherever you need to add some lift.

products.product_name: Morphe Rich & Foiled Artistry Palette - 9-Pan Metallic Eye Makeup Palette with Luxe Mattes, Shimmers, and Foil-Finishes - Mauve & Pink Colors with Luminous Shine - Rose to Fame (0.35 oz)
products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Makeup > Makeup Palettes
products.description:
Versatility for Eye-Catching Looks - Morphe’s Rich & Foiled Makeup Palette features nine high-performance shades inspired by precious metals. From luxe mattes and luminous shimmers to our debut molten metal foil shadow, this palette brings multidimensional drama to every eye look.
Debut Foil-Effect Formula - Features the first-ever molten metal eyeshadow for a true foil finish that flexes between creamy luminosity and liquid-like shine.
Customizable Looks - Apply shadows dry for soft, luminous color or wet for intensified, molten effects. Pair with Continuous Setting Mist to enhance foil payoff and precision.
How to Use - Using the side of a packing brush, sweep the molten metal colors across lids for smooth, blendable, incredibly luminous payoff. Spray your brush tip with Continuous Setting Mist, before picking up molten metal shades. Glide along lashlines or creases for molten-like shine.

This all-in-one holiday makeup kit includes your perfect foundation, two limited-edition brushes, and an incredible full-face palette that includes eyeshadows, a blush, a bronzer, and a highlighter. It's everything you need for any event this season!
Don't get overwhelmed with holiday makeup! This complete makeup kit is the perfect way to get started on your baked makeup for mature skin journey. It has everything you need in an easy-to-use palette and compact. We even included two professional makeup brushes!
Like all of Laura Geller's iconic baked makeup, these products are handmade in Italy and feel completely weightless on skin. They never cake or crease in fine lines, making them a fantastic choice for mature skin.
A great option for seasoned beauty pros or mature skin newcomers alike, this makeup kit also makes a fantastic gift! Since it includes everything you need for a full face of makeup, there's no guesswork. We even included two versatile travel-friendly brushes!

MULTICOLOR: Includes three baked neutral eyeshadows in subdued yet vibrant shades; a creamy bronze highlighter that infuses the skin with glamorous warm tones; light gold and champagne shades that instantly highlight with a single swipe; and a creamy peach-pink blush that delivers a naturally sweet flush.
INTENSE COLOR PIGMENTS: Each shade is enriched with highly concentrated pigments for rich, vibrant colors that create a striking and distinctive facial expression, with just one swipe for coverage.
CRAFTSMANSHIP: Highly pigmented powders allow you to mold your features to your heart's content, whether it's a natural look with soft contours or an eye-catching look with bold, dramatic effects.

Blush: Apply blush to the cheeks and smudge for a fresh, vibrant look. Bronzer: Apply bronzing powder to the entire face or swipe it over the temples, cheekbone hollows and jawline to create a warm, contoured look that accentuates facial lines.

UCANBE STARRY PALETTE includes 4 chunky glitter eyeshadows (GEL BASED) + 12 pressed glitter eyeshadows, each eye shadow can be used alone or mixed with matte eye shadow to make eyes more vivid and full of three-dimensional sense. Perfect for professional smoky eyes makeup, wedding makeup, party makeup or casual makeup.
★ Velvety Soft & Frosted Texture Cover ★ Without powder or cream based, this UCANBE glitter eyeshadow palette, made with cruelty-free and healthy formula which has test suitable for sensitive skin, is smooth and velvety texture powder. Just as its glitter eye shadow, the frosted texture of the cover is as bright as the star that twinkled in nighttime.
★ Multi-purpose Use ★ Better to apply glitter primer or glitter glue with this palette(4 chunky glitter eyeshadows no primer needed) ,the ultra pigmented glitter eyeshadow will waterproof and long lasting. This palette can be applied in nails, body and hair art.【Attention: As the sequins are small, please pay attention to avoid getting them into your eyes or ingestion!】
★ Easy to Remove ★ The glitter can be easily removed, makeup remover products & makeup wipe work fine to remove. If there is still a small amount of glitter stick to your skin after removal, rinsing with water to transfer completely.
Great idea for a Christmas and other Festival gift to lover, family and friends or a surprise for yourself!

products.product_name: Okerker Cool Toned Contour Palette with Mirror, Taupe Grey Contour Powder for Fair Pale Light Cool Toned Skin, Nose Contouring Bronzer Powder with Face Brush
products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Makeup > Makeup Palettes
products.description:
-For Cool, Fair Skin: Why Does This Contour Look Naturally Shadow-like? Formulated with authentic ash-grey powders specifically for cool/neutral fair complexions, this palette mimics real bone structure shadows. It neutralizes unwanted redness and refuses to turn orange or muddy, solving the mismatch of warm-toned contours on your skin to create a naturally sculpted look.
- Easily sculpt and define your features with the silky smooth powder that blends flawlessly, allowing for effortless application and buildable coverage that stays put all day.
- Lightweight and breathable formula that leaves no lines or creases for a natural finish. This long-lasting powder contour ensures a fresh, matte look that won't fade or become shiny on oily complexions.
- The smooth, buildable powder can be easily layered for a perfect match to your skin tone and face shape. Featuring a range of cool, matte hues, it allows you to customize your contour from a subtle definition to a dramatic sculpt.
- What are the features and uses of this makeup palette? This is a versatile makeup palette for contouring, eyeshadow, brows, and hairline. Its highly pigmented matte powder delivers a flawless, dimensional finish. For a natural look, apply lightly due to its high pigment concentration.
