products.product_name: COLORGRAM Pin Point Eyeshadow Palette 02 Pink+Mauve= | Ultra-Blendable Matte, Glitter, Shimmer Shades for Daily Makeup | K-Beauty Eye Palette with Easy-to-Use Calculator Design
products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Makeup > Makeup Palettes
products.description:
Daily Eye Makeup for Every Occasion: COLORGRAM Pin Point Eyeshadow Palette offers a diverse collection of shades, ranging from ultra-blendable matte to dazzling glitter and shimmering tones. Perfect for creating a variety of looks, from subtle daytime elegance to bold, dramatic evening styles. This versatile palette is designed to meet all your daily makeup needs, ensuring you always look your best.
[Unique and Easy-to-Use Calculator Design] Featuring a fun and functional "calculator" design, this palette includes a mix of matte, sheer, glittery, sparkly, and natural colors. Easily add (+), deduct (-), and equal (=) different shades to create the perfect combination that suits your mood and style. This innovative design makes it easy to experiment and find your ideal look, making it a must-have for both beginners and makeup enthusiasts.
[Long-Lasting, Smudge-Proof Performance] Enjoy vibrant, all-day wear with our long-lasting eyeshadows that are formulated to be fallout-free and smudge-proof. These high-quality shadows glide on effortlessly, providing a seamless finish that stays put from morning until night. Whether you're at work, at a party, or on a date, you can trust that your eye makeup will remain flawless and captivating.
[High-Quality Formula for a Professional Finish] The COLORGRAM Pin Point Eyeshadow Palette features 12 highly pigmented shades that deliver professional-level results. The ultra-soft texture ensures easy application and blending, allowing you to create stunning looks with ease. Despite its compact size, this palette includes a comprehensive range of colors, making it perfect for travel and on-the-go touch-ups.
[Cruelty-Free Commitment] At COLORGRAM, we are dedicated to providing cruelty-free beauty products. Our eyeshadow palette, along with all our products, is not tested on animals, allowing you to enhance your beauty routine with a clear conscience. Enjoy the high quality and ethical standards of COLORGRAM while looking fabulous.

products.description:

Moderate size: the size of square adhesive empty palette metal sticker is about 17 x 14 mm/ 0.67 x 0.55 inch. Makeup depotting tool is approx. 15 cm/ 5.90 inch. Round palette sticker is 25 mm in diameter
Package contents: you will receive 1 piece makeup depotting tool, 50 pieces square adhesive empty palette metal stickers and 50 pieces round makeup colorful palette stickers, enough quantity can meet your different needs
Note: these are made of metal which will adhere well to a magnet such as magnetic palette, but will not work with non-magnetic palette

products.product_name: LAURA GELLER NEW YORK The Best of the Best Baked Palette - Full Size - Includes Bronzer, Blush, 2 Highlighters and 3 Eyeshadows - Travel-Friendly
products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Makeup > Makeup Palettes
products.description:
BEST OF THE BEST PALETTE: This complete eye and face makeup palette includes three baked eyeshadows in beautiful neutral tones, a Baked Bronze-n-Brighten in Tahitian Glow, twp Baked Natural Glow Highlighter in French Vanilla and Portofino and a Baked Blush-n-Brighten in Pink Buttercream.
INCLUDES BLUSH, BRONZER, HIGHLIGHTER, AND EYESHADOW: These goodies are truly the best of our best! This all-in-one full face palette is the perfect introduction to our famous baked beauty. It includes a blush, bronzer, highlighter and three nude eyeshadows.
HANDMADE IN ITALY: Baked makes it better. Every formula in this eyeshadow, blush and highlighter palette starts out as a cream before being baked into a silky powder on terracotta tiles. Everything is artisan-made by hand in Italy.
ALL IN ONE PALETTE: These versatile, highly pigmented products sculpt, define, and highlight your features for flawless, all-day wear. Just start with your favorite foundation, add your favorite mascara and you’re ready to go!
HOW TO APPLY: Eyeshadows: Apply all over the lid. Use darker shades to define in the crease and blend lighter shades on browbone as a highlight., Highlighters: Dust across the tops of the cheekbones, down the bridge of the nose, and on the Cupid’s bow, Blush: Apply to apples of the cheeks for a fresh pop of color, Bronzer: Sweep all over your face to warm up your complexion or contour along the temples, hollows of the cheeks, and jawline for a more sculpted look.

GELLER'S GREATEST LIFT-N-GLOW TRIO: This powder face contouring palette contains three of Laura's fan-favorite baked beauty favorites that work for all skin tones, Tahitian Glow Baked Body Frosting, Pink Grapefruit Baked Blush-n-Brighten, and Toasted Coconut Baked Natural Glow Highlighter
BRONZER, HIGHLIGHT, BLUSH PALETTE: Three is truly better than one, especially when it comes to luminous baked beauty. This face palette from Laura Geller includes 3 bestsellers - a body frosting bronzer, radiant blush, and luminous highlighter - all in universal shades to flatter any skin tone.
ALL IN ONE PALETTE: Love to switch it up? With three gorgeous multidimensional baked bronzers, blushes, and highlighters for face to choose from, you’ll have endless combinations to try. Plus, this contouring palette makes it easy to sculpt your face too.
PERFECT FOR: Mature Skin, Sallow Skin, Highlighting
HOW TO APPLY: Using your Retractable Angled Kabuki Brush, apply bronzer in a "3" shape from the temples, cheekbone, and jawline. Use the same brush to apply the blush to the apples of the cheek. Finish by applying the highlighter on the bridge of the nose, cheekbones or wherever you need to add some lift.

products.product_name: Morphe Rich & Foiled Artistry Palette - 9-Pan Metallic Eye Makeup Palette with Luxe Mattes, Shimmers, and Foil-Finishes - Mauve & Pink Colors with Luminous Shine - Rose to Fame (0.35 oz)
products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Makeup > Makeup Palettes
products.description:
Versatility for Eye-Catching Looks - Morphe’s Rich & Foiled Makeup Palette features nine high-performance shades inspired by precious metals. From luxe mattes and luminous shimmers to our debut molten metal foil shadow, this palette brings multidimensional drama to every eye look.
Debut Foil-Effect Formula - Features the first-ever molten metal eyeshadow for a true foil finish that flexes between creamy luminosity and liquid-like shine.
Customizable Looks - Apply shadows dry for soft, luminous color or wet for intensified, molten effects. Pair with Continuous Setting Mist to enhance foil payoff and precision.
How to Use - Using the side of a packing brush, sweep the molten metal colors across lids for smooth, blendable, incredibly luminous payoff. Spray your brush tip with Continuous Setting Mist, before picking up molten metal shades. Glide along lashlines or creases for molten-like shine.

This all-in-one holiday makeup kit includes your perfect foundation, two limited-edition brushes, and an incredible full-face palette that includes eyeshadows, a blush, a bronzer, and a highlighter. It's everything you need for any event this season!
Don't get overwhelmed with holiday makeup! This complete makeup kit is the perfect way to get started on your baked makeup for mature skin journey. It has everything you need in an easy-to-use palette and compact. We even included two professional makeup brushes!
Like all of Laura Geller's iconic baked makeup, these products are handmade in Italy and feel completely weightless on skin. They never cake or crease in fine lines, making them a fantastic choice for mature skin.
A great option for seasoned beauty pros or mature skin newcomers alike, this makeup kit also makes a fantastic gift! Since it includes everything you need for a full face of makeup, there's no guesswork. We even included two versatile travel-friendly brushes!

MULTICOLOR: Includes three baked neutral eyeshadows in subdued yet vibrant shades; a creamy bronze highlighter that infuses the skin with glamorous warm tones; light gold and champagne shades that instantly highlight with a single swipe; and a creamy peach-pink blush that delivers a naturally sweet flush.
INTENSE COLOR PIGMENTS: Each shade is enriched with highly concentrated pigments for rich, vibrant colors that create a striking and distinctive facial expression, with just one swipe for coverage.
CRAFTSMANSHIP: Highly pigmented powders allow you to mold your features to your heart's content, whether it's a natural look with soft contours or an eye-catching look with bold, dramatic effects.

Blush: Apply blush to the cheeks and smudge for a fresh, vibrant look. Bronzer: Apply bronzing powder to the entire face or swipe it over the temples, cheekbone hollows and jawline to create a warm, contoured look that accentuates facial lines.

UCANBE STARRY PALETTE includes 4 chunky glitter eyeshadows (GEL BASED) + 12 pressed glitter eyeshadows, each eye shadow can be used alone or mixed with matte eye shadow to make eyes more vivid and full of three-dimensional sense. Perfect for professional smoky eyes makeup, wedding makeup, party makeup or casual makeup.
★ Velvety Soft & Frosted Texture Cover ★ Without powder or cream based, this UCANBE glitter eyeshadow palette, made with cruelty-free and healthy formula which has test suitable for sensitive skin, is smooth and velvety texture powder. Just as its glitter eye shadow, the frosted texture of the cover is as bright as the star that twinkled in nighttime.
★ Multi-purpose Use ★ Better to apply glitter primer or glitter glue with this palette(4 chunky glitter eyeshadows no primer needed) ,the ultra pigmented glitter eyeshadow will waterproof and long lasting. This palette can be applied in nails, body and hair art.【Attention: As the sequins are small, please pay attention to avoid getting them into your eyes or ingestion!】
★ Easy to Remove ★ The glitter can be easily removed, makeup remover products & makeup wipe work fine to remove. If there is still a small amount of glitter stick to your skin after removal, rinsing with water to transfer completely.
Great idea for a Christmas and other Festival gift to lover, family and friends or a surprise for yourself!

products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Makeup > Makeup Palettes
products.description:
-For Cool, Fair Skin: Why Does This Contour Look Naturally Shadow-like? Formulated with authentic ash-grey powders specifically for cool/neutral fair complexions, this palette mimics real bone structure shadows. It neutralizes unwanted redness and refuses to turn orange or muddy, solving the mismatch of warm-toned contours on your skin to create a naturally sculpted look.
- Easily sculpt and define your features with the silky smooth powder that blends flawlessly, allowing for effortless application and buildable coverage that stays put all day.
- Lightweight and breathable formula that leaves no lines or creases for a natural finish. This long-lasting powder contour ensures a fresh, matte look that won't fade or become shiny on oily complexions.
- The smooth, buildable powder can be easily layered for a perfect match to your skin tone and face shape. Featuring a range of cool, matte hues, it allows you to customize your contour from a subtle definition to a dramatic sculpt.
- What are the features and uses of this makeup palette? This is a versatile makeup palette for contouring, eyeshadow, brows, and hairline. Its highly pigmented matte powder delivers a flawless, dimensional finish. For a natural look, apply lightly due to its high pigment concentration.

products.product_name: COLORGRAM Pin Point Eyeshadow Palette 02 Pink+Mauve= | Ultra-Blendable Matte, Glitter, Shimmer Shades for Daily Makeup | K-Beauty Eye Palette with Easy-to-Use Calculator Design
products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Makeup > Makeup Palettes
products.description:
Daily Eye Makeup for Every Occasion: COLORGRAM Pin Point Eyeshadow Palette offers a diverse collection of shades, ranging from ultra-blendable matte to dazzling glitter and shimmering tones. Perfect for creating a variety of looks, from subtle daytime elegance to bold, dramatic evening styles. This versatile palette is designed to meet all your daily makeup needs, ensuring you always look your best.
[Unique and Easy-to-Use Calculator Design] Featuring a fun and functional "calculator" design, this palette includes a mix of matte, sheer, glittery, sparkly, and natural colors. Easily add (+), deduct (-), and equal (=) different shades to create the perfect combination that suits your mood and style. This innovative design makes it easy to experiment and find your ideal look, making it a must-have for both beginners and makeup enthusiasts.
[Long-Lasting, Smudge-Proof Performance] Enjoy vibrant, all-day wear with our long-lasting eyeshadows that are formulated to be fallout-free and smudge-proof. These high-quality shadows glide on effortlessly, providing a seamless finish that stays put from morning until night. Whether you're at work, at a party, or on a date, you can trust that your eye makeup will remain flawless and captivating.
[High-Quality Formula for a Professional Finish] The COLORGRAM Pin Point Eyeshadow Palette features 12 highly pigmented shades that deliver professional-level results. The ultra-soft texture ensures easy application and blending, allowing you to create stunning looks with ease. Despite its compact size, this palette includes a comprehensive range of colors, making it perfect for travel and on-the-go touch-ups.
[Cruelty-Free Commitment] At COLORGRAM, we are dedicated to providing cruelty-free beauty products. Our eyeshadow palette, along with all our products, is not tested on animals, allowing you to enhance your beauty routine with a clear conscience. Enjoy the high quality and ethical standards of COLORGRAM while looking fabulous.

products.product_name: Good Molecules Yerba Mate Wake Up Eye Gel - Hydrating Under Eye Gel Cream with Hyaluronic Acid and Caffeine - Target Dark Circles and Puffiness - Skin Care for Face
products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Skin Care > Eyes > Gels
products.description:
BRIGHT AND BEAUTIFUL: Rejuvenate and energize your eyes for a bright fresh look. Embrace newfound confidence with the Good Molecules Wake Up Eye Gel formulated with a combination of powerful ingredients to help you look your best.
GOODBYE PUFFY, TIRED EYES: Notice the difference! This nutrient-packed eye gel works to reinvigorate your eyes! Designed to reduce the signs of tired eyes, puffiness, and dark circles while also hydrating and plumping the skin to reduce the appearance of fine lines.
POTENT FORMULA, POWERFUL INGREDIENTS: Antioxidant-rich, sustainably sourced Yerba Mate works to protect and nourish the skin around your eyes. While caffeine and acetyl tetrapeptide-5 encourage a reduction in swelling and hyaluronic acid helps to plump and firm!
PERFECT ADDITION TO YOUR BEAUTY REGIMEN: Dispense a pea-sized amount and pat around the eye area with your ring finger. Gently massage into the eye contour until fully absorbed avoiding direct contact with your eyes. Can be used in the morning or at night.
GENTLE ENOUGH FOR ALL SKIN TYPES: Powerful enough to bring results and gentle enough for daily use; this gel is suitable for all skin types. Our serum has a pH of 5.2 and is vegan, fragrance-free, and cruelty-free.

products.product_name: CeraVe Eye Repair Cream, Under Eye Cream For Puffiness And Bags Under Eyes, Hyaluronic Acid + Niacinamide + Marine Botanical Complex, Oil Free & Opthalmologist Tested
products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Skin Care > Eyes > Creams
products.description: Developed with dermatologists, CeraVe Eye Repair Cream visibly reduces the look of under eye bags and puffiness. It contains 3 essential ceramides to repair and restore the protective skin barrier. For optimal results, apply in small dots around the eye area and gently smooth until thoroughly absorbed. Can be used once or twice daily in the AM and/or PM. Eye cream for men & women. •Fragrance-free •Non-comedogenic •Ideal for all skin types •Ophthalmologist-tested •Allergy-tested •Accepted by the National Eczema Association Key Ingredients: •Ceramides: Essential for healthy skin, ceramides help restore and maintain the skin’s natural barrier •Hyaluronic Acid: This ingredient attracts hydration to the skin’s surface and helps the skin retain moisture •Niacinamide: Helps calm the skin •MVE Technology: This patented delivery system continually releases moisturizing ingredients for 24-hour hydration •Marine & Botanical complex: Helps to reduce puffiness and appearance of bags under eye
features: [ UNDER EYE CREAM ] Puffy eye cream helps reduce puffiness in the under eye area. Depuffing eye cream with a non-greasy finish that leaves under eyes looking hydrated, smooth, brightened, and more awake.

[ HYDRATING INGREDIENTS ] Moisturizing eye cream with Hyaluronic Acid to help retain skin's moisture and Niacinamide to help soothe skin. Multi-Vesicular Emulsion (MVE) ingredient-delivery technology continually releases ingredients to provide lasting hydration.
[ LIGHTWEIGHT TEXTURE ] Apply pea-sized amount to ring fingers and gently pat around the eye area and brow bone, both AM and PM. Fast-absorbing formula can be worn alone or under makeup.

[ 3 ESSENTIAL CERAMIDES ] Ceramides are found naturally in the skin and make up 50% of the lipids in the skin barrier. All CeraVe products are formulated with three essential ceramides (1, 3, 6-II) to help restore and maintain the skin’s natural barrier

[ DEVELOPED WITH DERMATOLOGISTS & OPHTHALMOLOGIST TESTED ] Tested for use around the eye area & accepted by the National Eczema Association. CeraVe brand is developed with dermatologists & has products suitable for dry skin, oily skin, acne-prone, & more

products.description:
SOFTEN & SMOOTH WRINKLES - Frownies Wrinkle Patches naturally smooth static wrinkles and fine lines on the forehead and between the eyes. These anti- wrinkle patches are non-comedogenic and safe for sensitive skin. An easy last step in your skincare routine
NATURAL, SIMPLE, EFFECTIVE - Skip injectables with our natural, non-invasive alternative. Frownies are suitable for all ages and made from weighted unbleached Kraft paper and a water-activated starch-based adhesive. Our forehead patches are free from harsh chemicals and never tested on animals
CONSISTENCY MATTERS - Our Facial Patches are an overnight frown line treatment that splints facial muscles, lifts lines and relaxes facial tension, unlike other beauty face tapes. Regular use is important for sustained results. Use our wrinkle patches for a minimum of 30 consecutive nights, then as needed

products.product_name: COSRX Pink Peptides Collagen Hydrogel Eye Patch for Puffy Eyes and Dark Circles, Under Eye Mask, 60 Under Eye Patches, Korean Skin Care
products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Skin Care > Eyes > Masks
products.description:
Say goodbye to puffiness and hello to youthful eyes!: The Peptide Collagen Eye Patches, enriched with 4 powerful peptides and collagen, work to reduce puffiness, hydrate, and revitalize your under-eye area, leaving your skin looking refreshed and radiant.
Clinically Tested: Based on Clinical Tests, the Patches were confirmed to help reduce puffiness by 25%, improve hydration by 68%, and improve firmness by 17% on the under eyes with one use. *Eye Irritation and Sensitive Skin Irritation Tested.
Key Ingredients: 4 Peptides, Collagen, Caffeine, Niacinamide, Adenosine, Hyaluronic Acid, and Cyanocobalamin work together to help firm, depuff and provide volume to the under eyes.
How to Use: On clean, dry skin, place the gel eye patches under your eyes and leave on for about 10 minutes. Gently remove, then pat any remaining essence into the skin until fully absorbed. Two ways Usage : 1. Under-eye puffiness & wrinkles : Place the large round end towards your nose. 2. Crow's feet : Place the large round away from your nose.*Tips for Applying: Remove excess essence to prevent from slipping, and gently press patches to secure in place.
Patch Test Recommended: Perform a Patch Test on the body before using on the face. Proceed to using on the face if no irritation occurs in 24 hours. Consult with your doctor immediately if irritation occurs.

products.description: Developed with dermatologists, CeraVe Skin Renewing Eye Cream features an anti-aging peptide complex, hyaluronic acid, niacinamide, and caffeine to fight signs of aging around the delicate eye area. With continued use, this multi-tasking, anti wrinkle eye cream helps to improve the look of crow's feet wrinkles & fine lines, reveal firmer skin, and visibly brighten tired looking eyes. This lightweight and caffeinated eye cream delivers all-day moisture for eyes that look younger, healthier, and wide awake: skin feels softer and looks smoother, while under eye bags puffiness and wrinkles appear reduced. Upon application, this gentle yet effective formula has a white, semi-opaque appearance and quickly absorbs into skin, without leaving a sticky or greasy feeling. Can be worn alone or under makeup. Does not pill. Suitable for sensitive skin and contact lens wearers. Anti aging under eye cream for men and women. [ DEVELOPED WITH DERMATOLOGISTS ] CeraVe Skincare is developed with dermatologists and has products suitable for dry skin, sensitive skin, oily skin, acne-prone, and more.

products.description: Developed with dermatologists, CeraVe Eye Repair Cream visibly reduces the look of under eye bags and puffiness. Can be used once or twice daily in the AM and/or PM. Eye cream for men & women. •Fragrance-free •Non-comedogenic •Ideal for all skin types •Ophthalmologist-tested •Allergy-tested •Accepted by the National Eczema Association Key Ingredients: •Ceramides: Essential for healthy skin, ceramides help restore and maintain the skin’s natural barrier •Hyaluronic Acid: This ingredient attracts hydration to the skin’s surface and helps the skin retain moisture •Niacinamide: Helps calm the skin •MVE Technology: This patented delivery system continually releases moisturizing ingredients for 24-hour hydration •Marine & Botanical complex: Helps to reduce puffiness and appearance of bags under eye
features: [ UNDER EYE CREAM ] Puffy eye cream helps reduce puffiness in the under eye area. Depuffing eye cream with a non-greasy finish that leaves under eyes looking hydrated, smooth, brightened, and more awake.

[ HYDRATING INGREDIENTS ] Moisturizing eye cream with Hyaluronic Acid to help retain skin's moisture and Niacinamide to help soothe skin. Multi-Vesicular Emulsion (MVE) ingredient-delivery technology continually releases ingredients to provide lasting hydration.
[ LIGHTWEIGHT TEXTURE ] Apply pea-sized amount to ring fingers and gently pat around the eye area and brow bone, both AM and PM. Fast-absorbing formula can be worn alone or under makeup.

[ 3 ESSENTIAL CERAMIDES ] Ceramides are found naturally in the skin and make up 50% of the lipids in the skin barrier. All CeraVe products are formulated with three essential ceramides (1, 3, 6-II) to help restore and maintain the skin’s natural barrier

[ DEVELOPED WITH DERMATOLOGISTS & OPHTHALMOLOGIST TESTED ] Tested for use around the eye area & accepted by the National Eczema Association. CeraVe brand is developed with dermatologists & has products suitable for dry skin, oily skin, acne-prone, & more

products.product_name: COSRX Pink Peptides Collagen Hydrogel Eye Patch for Puffy Eyes and Dark Circles, Under Eye Mask, 60 Under Eye Patches, Korean Skin Care
products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Skin Care > Eyes > Masks
products.description:
Say goodbye to puffiness and hello to youthful eyes!: The Peptide Collagen Eye Patches, enriched with 4 powerful peptides and collagen, work to reduce puffiness, hydrate, and revitalize your under-eye area, leaving your skin looking refreshed and radiant.
Clinically Tested: Based on Clinical Tests, the Patches were confirmed to help reduce puffiness by 25%, improve hydration by 68%, and improve firmness by 17% on the under eyes with one use. *Eye Irritation and Sensitive Skin Irritation Tested.
Key Ingredients: 4 Peptides, Collagen, Caffeine, Niacinamide, Adenosine, Hyaluronic Acid, and Cyanocobalamin work together to help firm, depuff and provide volume to the under eyes.
How to Use: On clean, dry skin, place the gel eye patches under your eyes and leave on for about 10 minutes. Gently remove, then pat any remaining essence into the skin until fully absorbed. Two ways Usage : 1. Under-eye puffiness & wrinkles : Place the large round end towards your nose. 2. Crow's feet : Place the large round away from your nose.*Tips for Applying: Remove excess essence to prevent from slipping, and gently press patches to secure in place.
Patch Test Recommended: Perform a Patch Test on the body before using on the face. Proceed to using on the face if no irritation occurs in 24 hours. Consult with your doctor immediately if irritation occurs.

products.description:
Target crow's feet, fine lines and dark circles with Neutrogena Rapid Wrinkle Repair Retinol Anti-Wrinkle Eye Cream. Specially formulated for the delicate eye area, the retinol cream is suitable for daily use and helps fade the look of fine lines and stubborn crow's feet and brightens and evens the look of skin in the under-eye area. Perfect for use in a daily skincare routine, anti-aging formula contains retinol, a powerful dermatologist-proven form of vitamin A, to fight fine lines, dullness, wrinkles and dark spots. Our eye cream is formulated with pure retinol, which is scientifically proven superior to commonly used retinyl esters. Hyaluronic acid within this eye cream adds plumping moisture to help hydrate and rejuvenate the look of skin around the eyes. This dark circle targeting retinol cream is formulated without parabens, mineral oil, and dyes and comes from the #1 retinol brand used most by dermatologists.
It's a new era in anti-aging. Neutrogena Rapid Wrinkle Repair Eye Cream contains Accelerated Retinol SA, for visible results in just one week. Accelerated Retinol SA combines an exceptional level of Retinol SA with glucose complex, an exclusive booster that delivers pure stabilized retinol into the skin's surface quickly and effectively, leaving feeling smoother and younger-looking.
It's clinically proven to help: fade the look of stubborn crow's feet; brighten and even under eye area; smooth fine lines and texture; and reduce the look of dark circles.
Rapid Wrinkle Repair Eye CreamAt a Glance:
Retinol SAExclusive sustained action works to continuously renew the look of skin throughout the day helping to smooth wrinkles fast and diminish the look of age spots. Retinol SA is scientifically proven superior to other forms of Vitamin A, such as Pro-Retinol and Retinol Palmitate, in its ability to penetrate the skin's surface.
features: 0.5-fluid ounce tube of Neutrogena Fragrance-Free Rapid Wrinkle Repair Retinol Anti-Wrinkle Eye Cream with retinol & hyaluronic acid to target crow's feet, fine lines & dark circles. Your Rapid Wrinkle Repair just got upgraded, now with a soothing complex

products.product_name: CeraVe Eye Repair Cream, Under Eye Cream For Puffiness And Bags Under Eyes, Hyaluronic Acid + Niacinamide + Marine Botanical Complex, Oil Free & Opthalmologist Tested
products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Skin Care > Eyes > Creams
products.description: Developed with dermatologists, CeraVe Eye Repair Cream visibly reduces the look of under eye bags and puffiness. It contains 3 essential ceramides to repair and restore the protective skin barrier. For optimal results, apply in small dots around the eye area and gently smooth until thoroughly absorbed. Can be used once or twice daily in the AM and/or PM. Eye cream for men & women. •Fragrance-free •Non-comedogenic •Ideal for all skin types •Ophthalmologist-tested •Allergy-tested •Accepted by the National Eczema Association Key Ingredients: •Ceramides: Essential for healthy skin, ceramides help restore and maintain the skin’s natural barrier •Hyaluronic Acid: This ingredient attracts hydration to the skin’s surface and helps the skin retain moisture •Niacinamide: Helps calm the skin •MVE Technology: This patented delivery system continually releases moisturizing ingredients for 24-hour hydration •Marine & Botanical complex: Helps to reduce puffiness and appearance of bags under eye
features: [ UNDER EYE CREAM ] Puffy eye cream helps reduce puffiness in the under eye area. Depuffing eye cream with a non-greasy finish that leaves under eyes looking hydrated, smooth, brightened, and more awake.

[ HYDRATING INGREDIENTS ] Moisturizing eye cream with Hyaluronic Acid to help retain skin's moisture and Niacinamide to help soothe skin. Multi-Vesicular Emulsion (MVE) ingredient-delivery technology continually releases ingredients to provide lasting hydration.
[ LIGHTWEIGHT TEXTURE ] Apply pea-sized amount to ring fingers and gently pat around the eye area and brow bone, both AM and PM. Fast-absorbing formula can be worn alone or under makeup.

[ 3 ESSENTIAL CERAMIDES ] Ceramides are found naturally in the skin and make up 50% of the lipids in the skin barrier. All CeraVe products are formulated with three essential ceramides (1, 3, 6-II) to help restore and maintain the skin’s natural barrier

[ DEVELOPED WITH DERMATOLOGISTS & OPHTHALMOLOGIST TESTED ] Tested for use around the eye area & accepted by the National Eczema Association. CeraVe brand is developed with dermatologists & has products suitable for dry skin, oily skin, acne-prone, & more

products.description:
SOFTEN & SMOOTH WRINKLES - Frownies Wrinkle Patches naturally smooth static wrinkles and fine lines on the forehead and between the eyes. These anti- wrinkle patches are non-comedogenic and safe for sensitive skin. An easy last step in your skincare routine
NATURAL, SIMPLE, EFFECTIVE - Skip injectables with our natural, non-invasive alternative. Frownies are suitable for all ages and made from weighted unbleached Kraft paper and a water-activated starch-based adhesive. Our forehead patches are free from harsh chemicals and never tested on animals
CONSISTENCY MATTERS - Our Facial Patches are an overnight frown line treatment that splints facial muscles, lifts lines and relaxes facial tension, unlike other beauty face tapes. Regular use is important for sustained results. Use our wrinkle patches for a minimum of 30 consecutive nights, then as needed
EASY APPLICATION - Tear the patches along the perforations. Wet the shiny side with warm water or our Rose Water Hydrator. Wait a few moments to let the adhesive get tacky/sticky. Apply patches, overlapping and covering the full forehead. Wear while you sleep or for a minimum of 3 hours
GLOWING SKIN STARTS HERE - Frownies has been owned and operated by strong, independent women since 1889. Our mission is to inspire individuals of all ages to embrace a natural approach to skincare and beauty

products.product_name: COSRX Pink Peptides Collagen Hydrogel Eye Patch for Puffy Eyes and Dark Circles, Under Eye Mask, 60 Under Eye Patches, Korean Skin Care
products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Skin Care > Eyes > Masks
products.description:
Say goodbye to puffiness and hello to youthful eyes!: The Peptide Collagen Eye Patches, enriched with 4 powerful peptides and collagen, work to reduce puffiness, hydrate, and revitalize your under-eye area, leaving your skin looking refreshed and radiant.
Clinically Tested: Based on Clinical Tests, the Patches were confirmed to help reduce puffiness by 25%, improve hydration by 68%, and improve firmness by 17% on the under eyes with one use. *Eye Irritation and Sensitive Skin Irritation Tested.
Key Ingredients: 4 Peptides, Collagen, Caffeine, Niacinamide, Adenosine, Hyaluronic Acid, and Cyanocobalamin work together to help firm, depuff and provide volume to the under eyes.
How to Use: On clean, dry skin, place the gel eye patches under your eyes and leave on for about 10 minutes. Gently remove, then pat any remaining essence into the skin until fully absorbed. Two ways Usage : 1. Under-eye puffiness & wrinkles : Place the large round end towards your nose. 2. Crow's feet : Place the large round away from your nose.*Tips for Applying: Remove excess essence to prevent from slipping, and gently press patches to secure in place.
Patch Test Recommended: Perform a Patch Test on the body before using on the face. Proceed to using on the face if no irritation occurs in 24 hours. Consult with your doctor immediately if irritation occurs.

products.product_name: Neutrogena Rapid Wrinkle Repair Retinol Eye Cream for Dark Circles, Daily Anti-Aging Under Eye Cream with Retinol & Hyaluronic Acid to Fight Fine Lines, Wrinkles, & Dark Spots, 0.5 fl. oz
products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Skin Care > Face > Creams & Moisturizers > Face Moisturizers
products.description:
Target crow's feet, fine lines and dark circles with Neutrogena Rapid Wrinkle Repair Retinol Anti-Wrinkle Eye Cream. Specially formulated for the delicate eye area, the retinol cream is suitable for daily use and helps fade the look of fine lines and stubborn crow's feet and brightens and evens the look of skin in the under-eye area. Perfect for use in a daily skincare routine, anti-aging formula contains retinol, a powerful dermatologist-proven form of vitamin A, to fight fine lines, dullness, wrinkles and dark spots. products.description: Developed with dermatologists, CeraVe Eye Repair Cream visibly reduces the look of under eye bags and puffiness. Eye cream for men & women. •Fragrance-free •Non-comedogenic •Ideal for all skin types •Ophthalmologist-tested •Allergy-tested •Accepted by the National Eczema Association Key Ingredients: •Ceramides: Essential for healthy skin, ceramides help restore and maintain the skin’s natural barrier •Hyaluronic Acid: This ingredient attracts hydration to the skin’s surface and helps the skin retain moisture •Niacinamide: Helps calm the skin •MVE Technology: This patented delivery system continually releases moisturizing ingredients for 24-hour hydration •Marine & Botanical complex: Helps to reduce puffiness and appearance of bags under eye
features: [ UNDER EYE CREAM ] Puffy eye cream helps reduce puffiness in the under eye area. Depuffing eye cream with a non-greasy finish that leaves under eyes looking hydrated, smooth, brightened, and more awake.

[ HYDRATING INGREDIENTS ] Moisturizing eye cream with Hyaluronic Acid to help retain skin's moisture and Niacinamide to help soothe skin. Multi-Vesicular Emulsion (MVE) ingredient-delivery technology continually releases ingredients to provide lasting hydration.
[ LIGHTWEIGHT TEXTURE ] Apply pea-sized amount to ring fingers and gently pat around the eye area and brow bone, both AM and PM. Fast-absorbing formula can be worn alone or under makeup.

[ 3 ESSENTIAL CERAMIDES ] Ceramides are found naturally in the skin and make up 50% of the lipids in the skin barrier. All CeraVe products are formulated with three essential ceramides (1, 3, 6-II) to help restore and maintain the skin’s natural barrier

[ DEVELOPED WITH DERMATOLOGISTS & OPHTHALMOLOGIST TESTED ] Tested for use around the eye area & accepted by the National Eczema Association. CeraVe brand is developed with dermatologists & has products suitable for dry skin, oily skin, acne-prone, & more

products.product_name: COSRX Pink Peptides Collagen Hydrogel Eye Patch for Puffy Eyes and Dark Circles, Under Eye Mask, 60 Under Eye Patches, Korean Skin Care
products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Skin Care > Eyes > Masks
products.description:
Say goodbye to puffiness and hello to youthful eyes!: The Peptide Collagen Eye Patches, enriched with 4 powerful peptides and collagen, work to reduce puffiness, hydrate, and revitalize your under-eye area, leaving your skin looking refreshed and radiant.
Clinically Tested: Based on Clinical Tests, the Patches were confirmed to help reduce puffiness by 25%, improve hydration by 68%, and improve firmness by 17% on the under eyes with one use. *Eye Irritation and Sensitive Skin Irritation Tested.
Key Ingredients: 4 Peptides, Collagen, Caffeine, Niacinamide, Adenosine, Hyaluronic Acid, and Cyanocobalamin work together to help firm, depuff and provide volume to the under eyes.
How to Use: On clean, dry skin, place the gel eye patches under your eyes and leave on for about 10 minutes. Gently remove, then pat any remaining essence into the skin until fully absorbed. Two ways Usage : 1. Under-eye puffiness & wrinkles : Place the large round end towards your nose. 2. Crow's feet : Place the large round away from your nose.*Tips for Applying: Remove excess essence to prevent from slipping, and gently press patches to secure in place.
Patch Test Recommended: Perform a Patch Test on the body before using on the face. Proceed to using on the face if no irritation occurs in 24 hours. Consult with your doctor immediately if irritation occurs.

products.product_name: Neutrogena Rapid Wrinkle Repair Retinol Eye Cream for Dark Circles, Daily Anti-Aging Under Eye Cream with Retinol & Hyaluronic Acid to Fight Fine Lines, Wrinkles, & Dark Spots, 0.5 fl. oz
products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Skin Care > Face > Creams & Moisturizers > Face Moisturizers
products.description:
Target crow's feet, fine lines and dark circles with Neutrogena Rapid Wrinkle Repair Retinol Anti-Wrinkle Eye Cream. Specially formulated for the delicate eye area, the retinol cream is suitable for daily use and helps fade the look of fine lines and stubborn crow's feet and brightens and evens the look of skin in the under-eye area. Perfect for use in a daily skincare routine, anti-aging formula contains retinol, a powerful dermatologist-proven form of vitamin A, to fight fine lines, dullness, wrinkles and dark spots. Our eye cream is formulated with pure retinol, which is scientifically proven superior to commonly used retinyl esters. Hyaluronic acid within this eye cream adds plumping moisture to help hydrate and rejuvenate the look of skin around the eyes. This dark circle targeting retinol cream is formulated without parabens, mineral oil, and dyes and comes from the #1 retinol brand used most by dermatologists.
It's a new era in anti-aging. Neutrogena Rapid Wrinkle Repair Eye Cream contains Accelerated Retinol SA, for visible results in just one week. Accelerated Retinol SA combines an exceptional level of Retinol SA with glucose complex, an exclusive booster that delivers pure stabilized retinol into the skin's surface quickly and effectively, leaving feeling smoother and younger-looking.
It's clinically proven to help: fade the look of stubborn crow's feet; brighten and even under eye area; smooth fine lines and texture; and reduce the look of dark circles.
Rapid Wrinkle Repair Eye CreamAt a Glance:
Retinol SAExclusive sustained action works to continuously renew the look of skin throughout the day helping to smooth wrinkles fast and diminish the look of age spots. It helps support skin’s natural collagen **Based on a clinical study at 1 & 4 weeks compared to baseline. ***clinical study with self-assessment

INTENSE MOISTURE LOCK: Packed with Brazilian Açaí Butter and African Mongongo Butter, this clear lip balm gloss deeply moisturizes, leaving lips soft, supple, and well-nourished without the need for added fragrance or color.
GENTLE LIP SMOOTHING: Formulated with Hibiscus Enzymes, Lactic Acid, and Pyruvic Acid, it gently exfoliates to remove dead skin and smooth out lip texture, helping lips stay hydrated and look healthy.
LIGHTWEIGHT, NON-STICKY GLOSS: Enjoy a natural, glossy finish that is clear and unscented—perfect for those seeking a subtle, hydrating lip gloss with a comfortable shine without any heaviness or residue.
VEGAN, CLEAN & DERMATOLOGIST-TESTED: Le Chouchou is a vegan, cruelty-free lip care solution that’s dermatologist-tested and lead-free, ensuring safe and clean hydration for your lips with every application.

100% PURE USDA ORGANIC LIP BALM: Organic Sunflower Oil, Organic Beeswax, Organic Coconut Oil, Organic Cherry, Vanilla, Coconut, and Strawberry Flavors, Organic Essential Oils of Eucalyptus, Peppermint, Orange, Lemon, and Lime, Vitamin E, Organic Rosemary Extract, Organic Calendula Extract. Lip Plumper
THE USDA ORGANIC SEAL guarantees that the ingredients in this product are non-GMO and no herbicides or pesticides were used during the growth of the raw materials. This also guarantees that the products were produced in a USDA Organic Certified facility, following strict criteria for everything from cleanliness to Quality Assurance and more.
NON-GMO, GLUTEN FREE, Eco Friendly B-Corporation certified manufacturing, NO chemicals, NO fillers and No soy, NO petroleum or petroleum derivatives,! 100% USDA Certified Organic Lip Moisturizer. Nourishing Beeswax organic lip balm Perfect for Kids, Toddlers, Chapped Lips, Dry Lips, Cracked Lips, Lipstick base, Gift Sets. Best Organic Lip Care for all ages!
EARTH FRIENDLY PACKAGING: Our CRUELTY FREE products are never tested on animals and our packaging is completely recyclable. Our lip balm is proudly made in the USA using environmentally sustainable practices of the highest standards.

products.product_name: Burt’s Bees Tinted Boosted Balm, Misty Mauve, Hydrating Tinted Lip Balm with Vitamin C, E, and F Core, 24 Hour Lip Moisturizer with Responsibly Sourced Beeswax, 100% Natural Origin, 1 Count, 0.16oz
products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Skin Care > Lip Care > Balms & Moisturizers
products.description: Burt's Bees Misty Mauve Tinted Boosted Lip Balm instantly takes your lips to lovely, soft and hydrated in one pretty swipe. Made with responsibly sourced shea butter, botanical waxes and a softly tinted buildable color, this moisturizing lip balm accentuates your lips while delivering 24-hour moisture. The Misty Mauve tint has a naturally flattering, deep mauve hue to enhance your lips while keeping them nourished and hydrated. The unflavored lip balm features a core formulated with vitamins C, E and F that provides antioxidant protection and moisture barrier reinforcement for dry lips. The smooth texture adds a semi-glossy finish to your lips without any shimmer or pearlescence. Formulated without parabens, phthalates, petrolatum or SLS, this lip balm is 100% natural origin to rejuvenate and beautify lips with clean ingredients. You can conveniently tuck a tube into your pocket or purse to keep nurturing lip care handy always.
features: TINTED LIP BALM: One 0.16 oz. lip balm tube of Burt's Bees Misty Mauve Tinted Boosted Lip Balm that nourishes and hydrates while flattering lips with the perfect hint of buildable color
MOISTURIZED LIPS: Burt's Bees lip balm infused with responsibly sourced shea butter, botanical waxes and a vitamin-enriched core that provides 24-hour moisture to dry, chapped lips
BUILDABLE COLOR: Smooth texture of this lip balm adds a naturally flattering, deep mauve hue to lips without any shimmer or pearlescence
CONDITIONING LIP TREATMENT: This lip moisturizer leaves your lips smooth and refreshed with a semi-glossy finish from natural origin ingredients
CLEAN INGREDIENTS: Formulated without parabens, phthalates, petrolatum or SLS, this 100% natural origin lip balm revitalizes and beautifies your lips with clean ingredients
ON-HAND LIP THERAPY: Easy to tuck into a pocket or store in a purse, this balm is ready for summer, winter, fall and spring weather
